title: Russia completes first salary payment in digital ruble
body: The Russian government has paid a monthly salary in digital rubles for the first time, indicating it’s ready to continue to do that upon request. The news comes almost a full year in advance of the planned launch of Russia’s coin for public use, which will be carried out in stages, beginning next fall. Russia starts paying digital ruble salaries on request Russia has for the first time employed its central bank digital currency (CBDC) to pay a salary, the Ministry of Finance (Minfin) announced. “The first budget payment in digital rubles has been successfully completed,” the department stated in a press release published on its website on Wednesday. It further detailed: “The Russian Treasury has made the first salary payment in digital rubles to an individual holding a government position in the Russian Federation.” The department added that the experiment to introduce the sovereign coin into the budgetary process is being carried out jointly with the Central Bank of Russia (CBR), its issuer. Starting from January 1, 2026, the Minfin and the CBR will enable transactions between digital ruble accounts, the ministry also unveiled. The digital variant of the national fiat will be used for intra-budgetary transfers and to make various payments from the federal budget as well, explains the announcement . The ministry noted that payments in digital rubles will be made only at a recipient’s request. It did not reveal, however, who was the first to ask to have their wages credited in CBDC. Financial committee chair shares more Russian media found out that the first digital ruble salary was paid to Anatoly Aksakov, chairman of the Committee on Financial Markets at the State Duma, the lower house of the Russian parliament. Aksakov has been closely involved in legislative efforts to regulate digital financial assets in Russia and create the legal basis for the country’s own digital currency. The lawmaker received the money in his wallet on the CBR’s dedicated platform and then joined the testing of the digital Russian ruble by making some payments, his press service told RBC. The deputy transferred funds to the Life Line foundation for children with illnesses and to the SOS Children’s Villages charity for orphans. He also used the coins to place an order at a Teremok restaurant, a fast food chain that offers traditional Russian dishes on its menu. In July, Aksakov unveiled that he had asked relevant agencies to make him “the first person to start receiving a salary in digital rubles,” the business news outlet recalled. Digital ruble to be launched in 2026 The Bank of Russia began developing its CBDC in 2021. Two years later, the Russian parliament adopted the necessary legislation for its introduction. The CBR started trials later that same year, inviting a limited number of participants, including commercial banks, companies and private individuals. The coin’s launch was initially planned for 2025, but the monetary authority postponed it for next year. Following a call from President Vladimir Putin for its wide adoption this summer, the regulator scheduled it for September 1, 2026. The state-issued digital currency will be introduced in several stages. The dates were also approved by Russian lawmakers with a special law, which Putin signed in July. In June, the Moscow Metro, the subway system of the Russian capital, announced it had made its first digital ruble payment. In August, Russia registered the first real estate deal sealed using the government cryptocurrency, as reported by Cryptopolitan. And in September, St. Petersburg’s Pulkovo Airport, Russia’s second busiest, accepted digital rubles from a visitor who paid for parking, using his smartphone to scan a QR code. The air transit hub plans to introduce the CBDC payment option for other services in the future. Get seen where it counts. Advertise in Cryptopolitan Research and reach crypto’s sharpest investors and builders.

Nhà đầu tư Dogecoin đổ dồn sự chú ý vào coin mới – dự báo tăng 93 lần
body: Dogecoin (DOGE) đã trải qua những biến động mạnh trong vài tuần gần đây. Trong khi đó, các “cá voi” – nhà đầu tư lớn – đang tích cực tìm kiếm những cơ hội mới để đa dạng hóa danh mục. Phân tích xu hướng giá Dogecoin Từng được xem chỉ là một dự án giải trí, Dogecoin nay đã trở thành đồng meme coin đứng thứ 7 về vốn hóa thị trường. Gần đây, DOGE đã chạm mốc cao nhất trong 3 năm ở 0,43 USD, nhưng sau đó điều chỉnh nhẹ. Hiện DOGE đang giao dịch quanh mức 0,3832 USD, giảm 2% trong 24 giờ và 5% trong tuần, sau một đợt tăng mạnh trước đó. Điều này khiến các nhà đầu tư lớn bắt đầu tìm kiếm cơ hội ở các dự án mới nổi. Cá voi tập trung vào dự án mới nổi Toàn bộ thị trường meme coin đang trong giai đoạn điều chỉnh, với nhiều token giảm giá, kể cả Floki (FLOKI). Trong bối cảnh này, một dự án gây nhiều chú ý là Crypto All-Stars (STARS) – nền tảng phát triển MemeVault, giao thức staking tổng hợp đầu tiên dành cho meme coin. Chỉ trong 3 tháng ICO, STARS đã huy động hơn 18 triệu USD, với tốc độ dòng vốn khoảng 200.000 USD/ngày. Cơ hội mua presale kéo dài đến ngày 20/12, với mức giá hiện tại chỉ 0,0016782 USD. Theo dự báo, sau khi niêm yết, STARS có thể tăng 11 lần trong ngắn hạn, và thậm chí đạt tới 93 lần vào tháng 1/2025. Điểm nhấn: Nền tảng staking độc đáo Crypto All-Stars thu hút sự chú ý nhờ vào MemeVault – nền tảng staking tổng hợp đầu tiên cho phép nhà đầu tư stake nhiều meme coin cùng lúc để nhận thưởng. Hiện chương trình staking gốc của STARS đang mang lại lợi nhuận APY 376%, một con số cực kỳ hấp dẫn với cộng đồng. Khai thác và xu hướng thị trường Trong khi đó, Dogecoin hưởng lợi từ việc đào hợp nhất với Litecoin, giúp cải thiện lợi nhuận khai thác nhưng đồng thời cũng tạo ra áp lực bán lớn từ thợ mỏ.Cùng lúc, Bitcoin đang tiến gần ngưỡng lịch sử 100.000 USD, vượt trội so với altcoin , khiến các nhà đầu tư thêm phần thận trọng khi đánh giá tiềm năng tăng trưởng của DOGE trong ngắn hạn. Vì sao Bitcoin Hyper (HYPER) có thể là lựa chọn tiếp theo của bạn Trong khi Dogecoin, Stellar và Maxi Doge vẫn giữ được sức hút riêng, Bitcoin Hyper (HYPER) đang chứng minh rằng nó có thể trở thành cái tên thống trị trong làn sóng BitcoinFi sắp tới. Khác với những meme coin chỉ dựa vào cộng đồng, HYPER mang đến một hệ sinh thái thực tiễn, kết hợp AI, DeFi và staking để tạo ra giá trị bền vững. Với mức giá presale chỉ 0,0002 USD, HYPER mang lại cơ hội hiếm có cho những ai tham gia sớm, trước khi token này niêm yết trên các sàn giao dịch lớn. Ngoài ra, cộng đồng Hyper Army ngày càng phát triển mạnh, tổ chức các sự kiện, giveaway và chương trình thưởng staking, khiến HYPER không chỉ là một token, mà còn là một phong trào toàn cầu. Nếu bạn đang tìm kiếm một dự án có tiềm năng tăng trưởng khổng lồ trong bull run 2025, thì Bitcoin Hyper chính là cơ hội không nên bỏ lỡ.

Bitcoin: Treasury Corporation’s Strategic OTCQX Listing Unlocks New Growth
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin: Treasury Corporation’s Strategic OTCQX Listing Unlocks New Growth The world of cryptocurrency is constantly evolving, and a recent development has captured the attention of investors and enthusiasts alike. Bitcoin Treasury Corporation, a a company dedicated to accumulating digital assets, has made a significant move by listing on the U.S. OTCQX Best Market under the ticker BTCFF. This isn’t just another listing; it signals a growing trend of institutional confidence in digital assets and their long-term potential. What Does This Strategic OTCQX Listing Mean for Bitcoin Treasury Corporation? For those unfamiliar, the OTCQX Best Market is the highest tier of the three marketplaces for the over-the-counter (OTC) trading of stocks. It’s designed for established, investor-focused U.S. and international companies. Being listed here offers several distinct advantages for a company like Bitcoin Treasury Corporation. Enhanced Visibility: The listing provides a more transparent and regulated trading environment, making the company more attractive to a broader range of institutional and retail investors. Increased Liquidity: A higher-tier market often leads to greater trading volumes, which can improve the liquidity of the company’s shares. Credibility Boost: Operating on a recognized market lends significant credibility, especially for an entity deeply involved in the nascent crypto space. Bitcoin Treasury Corporation began its journey of accumulating BTC in June and has rapidly grown its holdings to over 700 BTC. This strategic accumulation underscores their belief in Bitcoin as a foundational asset for the future. Why Are More Companies Embracing Bitcoin for Their Treasuries? The move by Bitcoin Treasury Corporation isn’t an isolated incident. We’ve witnessed a remarkable shift in corporate finance over the past few years, with numerous companies integrating digital assets into their balance sheets. Why this sudden embrace of Bitcoin ? Many view Bitcoin as a powerful hedge against inflation, especially in an era of quantitative easing and rising global debt. Its decentralized nature and finite supply of 21 million coins make it an appealing “digital gold” alternative to traditional fiat currencies. Companies like MicroStrategy have famously adopted Bitcoin as their primary treasury reserve asset, demonstrating a bold vision for corporate capital allocation. While the potential for significant gains is attractive, companies must also navigate the inherent volatility of the crypto market and evolving regulatory landscapes. Despite these challenges, the long-term strategic benefits often outweigh the risks for those with a strong conviction in this digital asset. How Does This Listing Impact the Broader Bitcoin Market? Each time a company like Bitcoin Treasury Corporation makes such a move, it sends a ripple through the entire crypto ecosystem. It serves as a strong validation of Bitcoin as a legitimate and valuable asset class, not just a speculative tool. This increased institutional involvement can lead to: Greater Stability: As more large entities hold Bitcoin for the long term, it could potentially reduce some of the extreme price swings often associated with the asset. Mainstream Acceptance: Corporate adoption paves the way for wider public acceptance and understanding of cryptocurrencies. Regulatory Clarity: With more traditional companies engaging, regulators may be compelled to provide clearer guidelines, fostering a more secure environment for everyone involved with digital currencies. For individual investors, this trend suggests a maturation of the market. It implies that fundamental analysis and long-term investment strategies are becoming increasingly relevant in the Bitcoin space. Navigating the Future of Corporate Bitcoin Holdings The listing of Bitcoin Treasury Corporation on the OTCQX Best Market marks a pivotal moment. It highlights a growing confidence among corporations in integrating digital assets into their financial strategies. As the digital economy continues to expand, we can expect more companies to explore similar avenues for their Bitcoin investments. However, it’s crucial for any company considering Bitcoin for its treasury to conduct thorough due diligence. Understanding market dynamics, regulatory compliance, and secure custody solutions are paramount. The journey into corporate crypto holdings is still relatively new, but pioneers like Bitcoin Treasury Corporation are charting a course for others to follow. In conclusion, Bitcoin Treasury Corporation’s OTCQX listing is more than just a procedural step; it’s a powerful testament to the enduring appeal and increasing institutional acceptance of Bitcoin . This move not only benefits the company but also reinforces the broader narrative of digital assets’ emergence as a crucial component of modern financial portfolios. It’s an exciting time to watch the intersection of traditional finance and digital assets evolve. Frequently Asked Questions About Bitcoin Treasury Corporation’s Listing Q1: What is the OTCQX Best Market? A1: The OTCQX Best Market is the highest tier for over-the-counter (OTC) stock trading in the U.S. It’s for established companies that meet stringent financial and disclosure requirements, offering enhanced transparency and credibility for investors. Q2: Why is Bitcoin Treasury Corporation’s listing significant for Bitcoin? A2: This listing signifies increasing institutional confidence in Bitcoin as a legitimate asset. It provides a regulated platform for a company focused on accumulating Bitcoin , potentially encouraging more traditional investors and corporations to consider digital assets. Q3: How much Bitcoin does Bitcoin Treasury Corporation hold? A3: As of their announcement, Bitcoin Treasury Corporation holds over 700 BTC, having begun its accumulation strategy in June. Q4: What are the benefits for Bitcoin Treasury Corporation by listing on OTCQX? A4: Benefits include enhanced visibility, increased liquidity for its shares, and a significant boost in credibility by operating on a recognized and regulated market, making it more attractive to a wider investor base. Q5: Does this mean Bitcoin is becoming more mainstream? A5: Yes, corporate actions like this listing contribute significantly to Bitcoin ‘s mainstream acceptance. It helps validate digital assets as a serious component of financial portfolios, paving the way for wider public and institutional understanding. If you found this article insightful and believe in the growing importance of corporate Bitcoin adoption, please share it with your network! Your support helps us continue to provide valuable insights into the evolving world of cryptocurrency. title: Crypto Fear & Greed Index: Navigating the Crucial Neutral Stance
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto Fear & Greed Index: Navigating the Crucial Neutral Stance In the dynamic world of cryptocurrency, understanding market sentiment is paramount. Today, the Crypto Fear & Greed Index offers a fascinating snapshot, currently holding steady at 52 – firmly in the neutral zone. But what does this really mean for investors, and how can we interpret this balancing act of emotions? What Does the Crypto Fear & Greed Index Reveal? The Crypto Fear & Greed Index , a popular tool from Alternative.me, provides a daily barometer of the market’s emotional state. It’s a simple scale from 0 to 100, where 0 signifies “Extreme Fear” and 100 shouts “Extreme Greed.” A score of 52, as we see today, indicates that neither fear nor euphoria is dominating the scene; instead, there’s a delicate equilibrium. Extreme Fear (0-24): Investors are highly concerned, often leading to selling pressure. This can sometimes signal a buying opportunity for contrarian investors. Fear (25-49): General apprehension in the market. Neutral (50-54): A period of indecision, where the market isn’t leaning strongly in either direction. This is where the index currently sits. Greed (55-74): Growing optimism and potential for price surges. Extreme Greed (75-100): Overly enthusiastic market, often preceding a correction. How is This Crucial Sentiment Indicator Calculated? You might wonder how this single number captures such complex market psychology. The Crypto Fear & Greed Index isn’t just a guess; it’s a weighted average of several key factors, each contributing to the overall score. Understanding these components helps us appreciate the index’s comprehensive nature. Volatility (25%): Measures the current volatility and maximum drawdowns of Bitcoin compared to its average. Higher volatility often signals fear. Market Volume (25%): High trading volumes in a positive market can indicate greed, while high volumes during a downturn might suggest panic selling. Social Media (15%): Analyzes sentiment from various social media platforms, looking for keywords related to fear and greed, and the overall engagement around them. Surveys (15%): Although paused currently, these polls directly ask investors about their market outlook, providing a direct sentiment measure. Bitcoin Dominance (10%): An increasing Bitcoin dominance often indicates a shift from altcoins to Bitcoin, which can be a sign of fear or uncertainty in the broader altcoin market. Google Trends (10%): Examines search queries related to Bitcoin and other cryptocurrencies. Rising search interest for terms like “Bitcoin price manipulation” could signal fear. What Does a Neutral Crypto Fear & Greed Index Mean for You? A neutral reading on the Crypto Fear & Greed Index can be a double-edged sword. On one hand, it suggests a period of relative calm, potentially offering a stable environment for analysis rather than impulsive decisions driven by extreme emotions. On the other hand, neutrality can sometimes precede significant shifts, making vigilance key. For investors, this neutral stance encourages a balanced approach: Avoid Hasty Decisions: Don’t get swept away by short-term price movements. A neutral index suggests the market isn’t in an emotional frenzy. Conduct Thorough Research: This is an excellent time to delve into project fundamentals, upcoming developments, and market trends without the pressure of extreme fear or greed. Rebalance Portfolios: Consider if your current portfolio allocation aligns with your long-term goals. Neutral periods can be ideal for adjustments. Set Clear Strategies: Whether you’re a long-term holder or a day trader, having a predefined entry and exit strategy is crucial. The Power of Perspective: Beyond the Crypto Fear & Greed Index While the Crypto Fear & Greed Index is an invaluable tool, it’s essential to remember it’s just one piece of the puzzle. It reflects sentiment, but doesn’t dictate future price action directly. Savvy investors combine this indicator with technical analysis, fundamental research, and macroeconomic factors to form a comprehensive market view. The crypto market is inherently volatile. Emotional swings can lead to irrational decisions. By understanding tools like the index, you empower yourself to make more informed, rational choices, rather than reacting to the crowd’s sentiment. This balanced perspective is truly a game-changer for navigating the unpredictable crypto landscape. The current neutral reading of the Crypto Fear & Greed Index at 52 offers a moment of reflection rather than panic or euphoria. It’s a reminder that while emotions play a significant role in market dynamics, a data-driven, strategic approach remains the most reliable path. Use this neutral period wisely to refine your strategies, deepen your understanding, and prepare for whatever comes next in the fascinating world of digital assets. Stay informed, stay calm, and make empowered decisions. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What does a “neutral” reading on the Crypto Fear & Greed Index signify? A neutral reading, typically between 50 and 54, indicates that market participants are neither extremely fearful nor extremely greedy. It suggests a period of indecision or equilibrium, where strong emotional biases are not currently driving the market. Q2: How often is the Crypto Fear & Greed Index updated? The Crypto Fear & Greed Index is updated daily by Alternative.me, providing a fresh snapshot of market sentiment every 24 hours. Q3: Can the Crypto Fear & Greed Index predict future price movements? While the index is a valuable sentiment indicator, it does not directly predict future price movements. It helps investors understand the prevailing market psychology, which can inform their decisions when combined with other analytical tools like technical and fundamental analysis. Q4: Why is Bitcoin’s market capitalization dominance a factor in the index? Bitcoin’s dominance reflects its share of the total crypto market cap. A rising dominance can sometimes signal that investors are moving funds from more volatile altcoins back into Bitcoin, often perceived as a safer asset during times of uncertainty, thus contributing to a “fear” sentiment in the broader market. Q5: Should I buy when the index shows “Extreme Fear” and sell during “Extreme Greed”? Many experienced investors use a contrarian strategy, buying during extreme fear (when others are selling) and selling during extreme greed (when others are buying). However, this strategy carries risks and should be part of a well-developed investment plan, not the sole basis for decisions. Did this exploration of the Crypto Fear & Greed Index help you better understand market sentiment? Share this article with your fellow crypto enthusiasts and on social media to spread valuable insights! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin’s price action. This post Crypto Fear & Greed Index: Navigating the Crucial Neutral Stance first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: LivLive breathes life into M2E market with AR-based crypto rewards
body: The LivLive move-to-earn app is taking a new approach to the M2E niche by integrating augmented reality into an ecosystem where rewards are paid out based on physical actions, social value, and real-world interactions. Most past M2E projects relied on extractive token models that failed to deliver sustainable value. As a result, the NFTs and tokens in their ecosystems eventually lost all of their value, leaving users disappointed and the market stagnant. LivLive offers a fresh approach by combining augmented reality (AR), blockchain, and meaningful crypto rewards to revive and redefine M2E. It connects players and businesses, rewarding users for their data and actions while enabling companies to run optimised, measurable, and impact-driven marketing campaigns. The LivLive presale is offering a potential 12x with the presale price set at $0.02 and the launch at $0.25. LivLive: crypto rewards and M2E mechanics The LivLive protocol is an augmented reality game layer designed to shift how users interact with the world while offering businesses a next-generation approach to customer engagement and loyalty. The LivLive protocol overlays a digital layer onto the physical world, transforming every city street into an interactive ecosystem. Here, users are rewarded directly for their actions, unlike the Web2 model, where corporations harvest and sell data. Businesses engage by sponsoring quests that drive foot traffic, generate authentic reviews, and build measurable trust. At the heart of the ecosystem is the $LIVE token. It is used to reward players for their actions, provide governance options, and serve as a medium of exchange between businesses and the LivLive community. Unlike previous M2E projects that focused on speculative tokens and short-lived hype, LivLive offers a sustainable model centred on real utility and lasting value for users and businesses alike. A key element of the project is the integration of real-world assets (RWAs) as rewards. Beyond ‘just tokens’, players can unlock tangible prizes like event tickets, branded merchandise, and travel experiences, bringing real value to every achievement. Another essential feature is delivering a personalised experience to every player. AI personalisation tailors quests and rewards to each user, enhancing engagement and creating meaningful interactions within the LivLive AR world. The $LIVE token powering the M2E ecosystem The $LIVE token is central to the ecosystem and the broader objectives of LivLive. Unlike some tokens associated with M2E projects in the past, $LIVE offers much more than an opportunity for short-term speculation. It is a multi-utility token with a maximum supply of 1 billion and a transparent, fair launch tokenomics structure. The token’s utility includes in-game transactions, mining power multipliers, trading on supported exchanges, and unlocking exclusive experiences within the LivLive AR world. Players use $LIVE to participate actively, access rewards, and engage with the platform’s features. Moreover, $LIVE plays a crucial role in bridging the digital and real economies. Through partnerships with brands and companies, it enables users to earn tangible rewards and services, connecting blockchain technology with real-world value. This integration strengthens the LivLive ecosystem by creating lasting value for both players and businesses. $LIVE tokenomics. LivLive presale bundles available now The $LIVE token presale is live, offering early exposure to the project with five different tiers. Every tier provides full access to the AR game through a physical wristband, along with varying $LIVE token allocations and bonuses. Each tier also determines the mining power, which affects how much $LIVE players can earn by completing quests in the LivLive AR world. Higher tiers offer stronger multipliers, enabling faster and more consistent token mining. The presale includes access to the $2.5 million treasure hunt, where NFT keys are awarded to unlock virtual chambers containing token prizes, including a grand prize of $1 million in $LIVE tokens. Presale participants will hold 75% of the total $LIVE supply. After the presale, new tokens will be introduced through mining rewards, positioning presale holders as key market leaders within the LivLive ecosystem. title: Panasonic touts new EV battery tech as capacity upgrade
body: Japanese multinational manufacturer Panasonic Holdings Corporation plans to develop a new type of higher-capacity battery in about two years. The company said the new batteries aim to extend the driving range of electric vehicles with the new batteries. The firm also plans to eliminate the anode in batteries during the manufacturing stage to boost energy density. Panasonic believes the initiative will likely provide more advanced capacity levels by the end of 2027. Panasonic expects a 25% increase in battery capacity The opening of @panasonic ’s $4 billion electric vehicle battery plant in @CityofDeSotoKS later this month means 4,000 new 🇺🇸 jobs and an investment in tomorrow’s workforce and tomorrow’s economy. A fascinating discussion with @panasonic President and CEO Yuki Kusumi on the future… pic.twitter.com/0aSg6DxvVL — ジョージ・グラス駐日米国大使 (@USAmbJapan) July 1, 2025 Panasonic acknowledged that the new products could lead to a 25% increase in battery capacity, which it expects will boost the driving range of Tesla’s Model Y vehicles. Panasonic disclosed that the improvement will reduce the driving range of Tesla’s most affordable sport-utility vehicles by roughly 90 miles (about 14 km), at the current battery pack size. Reuters reported that one of the executives at Panasonic said the announcement came ahead of a presentation on Thursday by Shoichiro Watanabe, the technology chief at the group’s battery arm. The official also revealed that the technology is being sought after by a flurry of global battery manufacturers. According to the report, the new battery will not have an anode at the manufacturing stage; rather, a lithium metal anode will be formed after being charged for the first time. The company said the technology will allow more active cathode materials, including nickel, aluminium, and cobalt, to increase capacity without changing the volume. The Japanese firm added that it plans to reduce nickel production, arguing that it’s relatively more expensive. On Wednesday, Vantage Market Research projected that the global EV battery recycling market will surge at a CAGR of 40.8% from $0.57 billion in 2024 to $24.5 billion by 2035. The research company argued that EV battery recycling enables the recovery of critical raw materials while reducing environmental impact and supply-chain dependence. The initiative also offers value to automakers and energy providers by lowering raw material volatility, reducing import reliance, and enabling greener EV production. Vantage forecasts a rise in EV battery recycling According to the research, the Asia Pacific region leads in EV battery recycling due to massive EV production in Japan, China , and South Korea. Lithium-ion batteries also accounted for the major share in 2024. The research firm also estimates that EVs will reach 200 million globally by 2030, creating a huge amount of end-of-life batteries. CEO and founder Nnega Rathod Godbole said that EV battery recycling is not just an environmental compliance initiative, but it’s becoming a strong push towards sustainable mobility and energy economy. MIT researchers also came up with a new kind of self-assembling battery material that quickly breaks apart when submerged in a simple organic liquid. According to the report, the team found a way for the material to work as the electrolyte in a functioning, solid-state battery cell and then revert to its original molecular components. The report’s author, Yukio Cho, said the approach offers an alternative to shredding batteries since the electrolyte serving as the battery’s connecting layer helps accelerate the recycling process. He also revealed that the current battery sector has been focused on high-performing materials and designs, but has later sought to find a way to recycle without the complex structures and hard-to-recycle materials. title: Dogecoin is up 50% since Elon Musk fallout with Trump
body: Elon Musk’s feud with President Donald Trump has proven to be one of the most significant political dramas this year, affecting the billionaire’s businesses and now seemingly delivering a surprising boost to the crypto market . Namely, since the fallout started following the June 5 spat regarding the One Big Beautiful Bill Act, Dogecoin ( DOGE ), Musk’s favorite cryptocurrency has surged nearly 50%, climbing from $0.1882 to $0.2799 on September 18. What’s more, the meme coin is not only up 5.42% on the day at the time of writing, but it is also the biggest gainer among the top 10 largest cryptocurrencies over the past week, outperforming the market with an 11.43% surge. Top 10 cryptocurrencies. Source: CoinMarketCap Dogecoin ETFs on the horizon The rally has largely been fuelled by the launch of the spot Dogecoin exchange-traded fund ( ETF ) scheduled for today, together with the long-awaited XRP ETF . Launching Tomorrow: REX-Osprey™ XRP ETF, $XRPR , & REX-Osprey™ DOGE ETF, $DOJE . The first U.S.-listed ETFs offering spot exposure to $XRP and $DOGE go live tomorrow, offering investors a way to access these digital assets through an ETF structure. Brought to you by… pic.twitter.com/NbyQqEs1YQ — REX Shares (@REXShares) September 17, 2025 Underscoring the rising demand for diversified crypto exposure beyond Bitcoin ( BTC ) and Ethereum ( ETH ) on behalf of both institutional and retail investors, the launch of REX-Osprey Dogecoin ETF (DOJE) generated a lot of speculation regarding the cryptocurrency’s potential trajectory in the following months. “Like I said, the next couple of months will be wild,” said ETF Store president Nate Geraci on X . The ETF debut also comes as the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) faces deadlines on multiple other spot applications, including Grayscale’s attempt to convert its own Dogecoin Trust into an ETF by mid-October. Accordingly, market watchers expect to see the digital currency transition from a meme coin to a Wall Street-backed financial product, with price targets as high as $5 floating around as some of the more bullish projections. DOGE DOGE DOGE DOGE 5 $ $DOGE #DOGE pic.twitter.com/VgK1qUk7Zd — CryptoELlTES (@CryptooELITES) September 16, 2025 Such a move would mark an incredible 1,600% surge from current levels. While the projection may sound outlandish, a substantial amount of institutional capital is likely to come into play, so sudden spikes could indeed be surprising, especially given DOGE’s strong reliance on hype. Featured image via Shutterstock The post Dogecoin is up 50% since Elon Musk fallout with Trump appeared first on Finbold .

title: Aave V4: Unlocking a Revolutionary Future for Decentralized Lending
body: BitcoinWorld Aave V4: Unlocking a Revolutionary Future for Decentralized Lending The world of decentralized finance (DeFi) is constantly evolving, and a significant milestone is on the horizon. The leading decentralized crypto lending protocol, Aave (AAVE), is gearing up for the highly anticipated launch of Aave V4 in the fourth quarter of this year. This upcoming version promises to redefine how users interact with lending and borrowing, introducing a groundbreaking architectural shift that could enhance flexibility and security across the platform. What is the Hub-and-Spoke Architecture in Aave V4? At the core of the Aave V4 upgrade is a brand-new Hub-and-Spoke architecture. This innovative structure moves away from the traditional monolithic design, where all assets and risk parameters were managed uniformly. Instead, it creates a central ‘hub’ that connects to multiple specialized ‘spokes’. Think of the hub as the central nervous system, managing overall liquidity and core functionalities. Each ‘spoke’, on the other hand, acts as a dedicated, independent module tailored to specific asset characteristics or risk profiles. This modular approach allows for greater customization and isolation of risks, which is crucial for a robust DeFi ecosystem. Unlocking Enhanced Flexibility and Liquidity with Aave V4 The introduction of the Hub-and-Spoke architecture with Aave V4 brings several compelling benefits, addressing some of the key challenges in decentralized lending: Flexible Risk Management: Individual spokes can implement unique risk parameters, collateral factors, and liquidation thresholds. This means a volatile asset can have stricter rules without impacting more stable assets in other spokes. Tailored Asset Support: The protocol can now support a wider variety of assets, including those with unique characteristics or regulatory considerations, by assigning them to specialized spokes. This opens up new avenues for lending and borrowing. Liquidity Network Effects: While spokes are independent, they all benefit from the aggregated liquidity at the hub level. This ensures that even specialized markets maintain deep liquidity, improving capital efficiency for all users. This strategic move by Aave aims to create a more resilient and adaptable lending platform, capable of handling diverse assets and market conditions more effectively. It represents a significant step forward in making DeFi more secure and accessible. How Will Aave V4 Impact Decentralized Lending Users? For existing Aave users and new participants in the DeFi space, Aave V4 is set to deliver a more refined and secure experience. The ability to manage risks on a per-asset basis means the entire protocol becomes more robust against isolated incidents or exploits related to specific tokens. Users can expect more tailored lending opportunities, potentially with better rates for certain asset classes due to optimized risk management. Furthermore, the increased flexibility could lead to the listing of a broader range of assets on Aave, expanding the utility and reach of the protocol significantly. This upgrade reinforces Aave’s commitment to innovation and user protection. Looking Ahead: The Future of Aave with V4 The launch of Aave V4 is not just an incremental update; it is a strategic repositioning for the future of decentralized finance. By embracing a modular design, Aave is paving the way for greater scalability, allowing the protocol to adapt quickly to new market demands and technological advancements. While the transition to a new architecture will require careful auditing and community governance, the long-term benefits for the entire ecosystem are substantial. This upgrade underscores Aave’s leadership in the DeFi space, demonstrating a proactive approach to enhancing security, efficiency, and user experience. It’s an exciting time for anyone invested in the future of decentralized lending. Conclusion The planned Q4 launch of Aave V4 marks a pivotal moment for the decentralized lending giant. With its innovative Hub-and-Spoke architecture, Aave is set to deliver unparalleled flexibility, enhanced risk management, and stronger liquidity network effects. This upgrade is poised to strengthen Aave’s position as a leading DeFi protocol, offering a more robust, adaptable, and user-centric platform for the future of crypto lending. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is Aave V4? Aave V4 is the upcoming major version upgrade for the decentralized crypto lending protocol Aave, planned for launch in Q4 this year. It introduces a new Hub-and-Spoke architecture to enhance flexibility, risk management, and liquidity. When is Aave V4 expected to launch? According to Aave’s official roadmap, Aave V4 is scheduled to launch in the fourth quarter of this year (Q4 2024). What is the Hub-and-Spoke architecture in Aave V4? It’s a new design where a central ‘hub’ manages core liquidity and functions, while multiple specialized ‘spokes’ handle specific assets or risk profiles independently. This allows for tailored risk management and greater modularity. How will Aave V4 benefit users? Users can expect more flexible and tailored lending options, enhanced risk isolation for specific assets, and improved overall protocol security and capital efficiency due to better liquidity management. Is Aave V4 expected to be more secure than previous versions? Yes, the Hub-and-Spoke architecture in Aave V4 is designed to improve security by allowing for isolated risk management on individual spokes. This means issues with one asset or market are less likely to impact the entire protocol. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network! Your support helps us bring more valuable insights into the evolving world of decentralized finance. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping DeFi institutional adoption. This post Aave V4: Unlocking a Revolutionary Future for Decentralized Lending first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Building the best crypto portfolio: everything you need to know
body: Building a crypto portfolio in 2025 requires more than simply buying the coins that dominate headlines. With the market becoming increasingly complex, investors need strategies that balance long-term security with exposure to exponential upside. The goal is not only to survive volatility but to thrive during market cycles that can generate life-changing returns. Analysts argue that the best portfolios today mix foundational large-cap assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum with fast-growing ecosystems such as Solana and carefully chosen presale projects. This layered approach ensures resilience while capturing opportunities for outsized gains. One project frequently cited in this conversation is MAGACOIN FINANCE, which has quickly become one of the most talked-about presale tokens thanks to its scarcity model, legitimacy through audits, and strong community momentum. Foundations of a crypto portfolio Every successful crypto portfolio begins with a solid foundation. For most investors, that foundation is Bitcoin. With its fixed supply and growing institutional adoption through ETFs, Bitcoin remains the closest equivalent to digital gold. Analysts suggest allocating a significant portion of any portfolio to Bitcoin for stability and long-term appreciation. Ethereum serves as the second cornerstone, offering exposure to decentralized finance, tokenization, and staking mechanics that provide consistent demand. Together, Bitcoin and Ethereum form the core of most long-term strategies, ensuring portfolios are anchored to assets that have repeatedly proven their staying power across cycles. The role of growth assets Once a foundation is established, the next step is to incorporate growth assets. Solana is a leading candidate in this category, with its speed, scalability, and expanding ecosystem attracting both developers and institutional investors. Avalanche, Polkadot, and other layer-1 blockchains can also play this role, offering exposure to ecosystems with room to grow. Analysts note that allocating to these assets provides investors with upside beyond the conservative returns of Bitcoin and Ethereum. While they carry more volatility, they also deliver stronger growth during bullish cycles, making them essential for portfolios that aim to outperform. Diversification through presales A strong crypto portfolio balances foundation assets like Bitcoin and Ethereum with high-upside plays that capture speculative momentum. Analysts stress the importance of diversification, highlighting that presales can provide outsized returns when chosen wisely. MAGACOIN FINANCE is increasingly featured in such discussions, with ROI projections up to 11,000% driving serious retail attention. What elevates it beyond hype is audit-backed legitimacy, CertiK and HashEx approvals confirm its structure, offering confidence rarely found at this stage. For those constructing portfolios, the takeaway is clear: resilience should come from majors, but exponential growth comes from asymmetric bets like MAGACOIN FINANCE. Analysts argue this presale isn’t just a speculative flyer, it’s becoming the strategic high-upside component of modern portfolio design. Balancing allocation strategies The key to building a strong portfolio lies in allocation. Analysts recommend dividing capital across three categories: foundations, growth assets, and speculative opportunities. Foundations like Bitcoin and Ethereum may take up 50–60% of the portfolio, growth assets such as Solana 20–30%, and presales like MAGACOIN FINANCE 10–20%. This mix provides stability while maintaining exposure to exponential upside. Investors are reminded that diversification does not mean owning every token—it means owning the right mix of tokens that complement one another. By blending these categories, portfolios can perform well across different phases of the cycle. Timing matters Another crucial element in portfolio construction is timing. Entering positions during periods of consolidation often provides the best risk-adjusted opportunities. Historical data shows that investors who accumulated during market lulls, rather than chasing rallies, consistently outperformed. In 2017, 2020, and 2023, September and October accumulations preceded strong year-end rallies. Analysts suggest that 2025 may follow a similar pattern, with opportunities to enter Ethereum, Solana, and presales like MAGACOIN FINANCE before broader retail participation accelerates. Timing, combined with allocation, forms the backbone of successful portfolio design. The importance of community momentum While fundamentals matter, community momentum remains one of the strongest drivers of crypto valuations. Bitcoin’s rise was fueled by conviction, Ethereum’s by builders, and Shiba Inu’s by retail energy. MAGACOIN FINANCE is now showcasing this dynamic in real time. Its Telegram and X communities are expanding rapidly, creating a feedback loop where growing interest fuels demand, and demand strengthens the narrative. title: Crypto Markets Today: BNB, AVAX and DOT Lead Futures Trends
body: Major cryptocurrencies, including bitcoin (BTC), ether (ETH), XRP (XRP), solana (SOL) and others, are trading on the front foot following Wednesday's interest-rate cut by the Federal Reserve. Still, some analysts are maintaining a cautious bias. "The Fed rate cut gave crypto a near-term lift, but the rally is not yet clean," Timothy Misir, head of research, BRN, said in an email. "Institutional flows are supportive overall, yet exchange inflows and a single-day ETF outflow signal distribution into strength." Misir suggested traders use a bitcoin price band of $115,000–$115,500 as the guardrail for tactical risk management. Derivatives Positioning by Omkar Godbole BNB, AVAX, and DOT have all seen double-digit increases in futures open interest (OI) in the past 24 hours, reinforcing their price gains of 5% to 9%. BTC's cumulative OI in USD and USDT-denominated perpetual futures continues to drop, diverging from the ascending price. Perhaps derivative traders are not participating in the rally. (Check out the Technical Analysis section.) BCH, TRX, BNB, BTC, XMR, AVAX, and SUI stand out with a positive open interest-adjusted cumulative volume delta, indicating strong buying pressure. There are no signs of overheating even in the further corners of the crypto market, as annualized funding rates for smaller speculative tokens remain at around 10%. On the CME, OI in ether futures is again closing on the 2 million ETH mark, while positioning in BTC futures remains considerably light. The annualized three-month basis for both tokens remains below 10%, offering significantly lower yield to carry traders than SOL's 17% return. On Deribit, 25-delta risk reversals reveal a neutral to bearish (put) bias in options out to March expiry. In contrast, ether options are bullish across all tenors. Block flows on OTC network Paradigm featured demand for the $116K call expiring on Sept. 19 and the $100K put expiring on Oct. 31. Token Talk By Oliver Knight The altcoin market staged a strong rebound following Wednesday's oversold RSI readings, with several tokens posting gains in excess of 10%. Leading the rally is ether.fi (ETHFI), up 12% in the past 24 hours to $1.64, the highest since January. BNB also notched a milestone, breaking through $1,000 for the first time as momentum accelerates toward fresh record highs. The bullish backdrop comes as bitcoin creeps up toward $117,300, consolidating above critical support at $110,000. Meanwhile, bitcoin dominance slipped to 56% at CoinMarketCap, its lowest since early January, highlighting investors’ growing appetite for more speculative investments. The decentralized finance (DeFi) sector has been one of the largest beneficiaries of Thursday's move higher, with total value locked (TVL) across all protocols hitting $170 billion , the highest point since April, 2022. Hyperliquid's layer-1 blockchain notched a record high of $2.77 billion having risen by 3.88% in 24 hours, while Sui's TVL is up by 3% to $2.1 billion.

title: Urgent Alert: Upbit Halts POKT Deposits and Withdrawals Amid Network Freeze
body: BitcoinWorld Urgent Alert: Upbit Halts POKT Deposits and Withdrawals Amid Network Freeze Are you an Upbit user with Pocket Network (POKT) holdings? Then you need to know about a significant development that could impact your digital assets. South Korean crypto exchange Upbit has announced the temporary suspension of POKT deposits and withdrawals . This crucial move comes directly from a halt in Pocket Network’s block production, impacting users’ ability to move their POKT tokens effectively. What Exactly Caused the Halt in POKT Deposits and Withdrawals? Upbit’s decision to suspend POKT deposits and withdrawals stems from a critical issue within the Pocket Network itself. The network has experienced a complete halt in its block production. In simple terms, new blocks are not being added to the blockchain, which is essential for processing and confirming transactions. When a blockchain stops producing blocks, it means no new transactions can be recorded or verified. This directly affects the reliability and security of transferring POKT tokens. Upbit, prioritizing user asset safety, acted quickly to prevent potential issues such as lost funds or transaction errors. This situation is temporary, but it underscores the technical challenges that can arise in the fast-paced world of blockchain technology. Understanding the Immediate Impact on Upbit Users For users holding POKT on Upbit, this suspension of POKT deposits and withdrawals means you currently cannot move your tokens onto or off the exchange. Your existing POKT holdings within Upbit remain secure, as the issue is with the network, not the exchange’s security. However, their liquidity is temporarily restricted. What should you do if you are affected by this situation? Stay Informed: Regularly check Upbit’s official announcements and the Pocket Network’s communication channels for the latest updates. Avoid Unverified Information: Rely only on official sources for updates regarding the resumption of POKT deposits and withdrawals to prevent misinformation. Upbit has a strong track record of communicating such events transparently to its user base, ensuring clarity during uncertain times. What is Pocket Network (POKT) and Why Does Block Production Matter? Pocket Network (POKT) is a decentralized relay infrastructure designed for Web3 applications. It enables decentralized applications (dApps) to query various blockchains without relying on centralized intermediaries. POKT tokens are used to incentivize node operators who relay these requests, ensuring a robust and decentralized service. Block production is the lifeblood of any blockchain. Each block contains a batch of confirmed transactions. When block production stops: New transactions cannot be processed or validated. The entire network becomes unresponsive, halting all on-chain activity. Exchanges like Upbit must pause activities like POKT deposits and withdrawals to prevent lost funds or transaction errors, safeguarding user assets. This temporary halt highlights the critical importance of robust network stability and continuous operation for any blockchain project. What Are the Broader Implications for the Crypto Ecosystem? Incidents like the temporary suspension of POKT deposits and withdrawals by a major exchange such as Upbit serve as important reminders for the broader cryptocurrency ecosystem. They highlight the inherent technical risks associated with early-stage blockchain projects and the continuous need for development, monitoring, and quick problem-solving. Exchanges play a vital role in protecting users when underlying network issues occur. Their quick response can mitigate potential losses and maintain user trust. This event also emphasizes: The importance of decentralization and redundancy in blockchain infrastructure to minimize single points of failure. The need for clear, timely communication from project teams during outages to keep the community informed. Such challenges, while inconvenient, often lead to stronger, more resilient networks in the long run as vulnerabilities are identified and addressed. Looking Ahead: When Will POKT Deposits and Withdrawals Resume? The temporary nature of this suspension means that Upbit will likely resume POKT deposits and withdrawals once Pocket Network successfully resolves its block production issues. The exact timeline for resolution depends entirely on the Pocket Network development team’s efforts and the complexity of the underlying problem. Users should exercise patience and monitor official announcements closely for updates. Upbit has committed to providing updates as soon as the network stabilizes and operations can safely resume. This proactive approach helps maintain user confidence and ensures a smooth return to normal service for POKT holders. In conclusion, Upbit’s temporary halt of POKT deposits and withdrawals is a direct consequence of a block production issue on the Pocket Network. While inconvenient for users, it is a necessary and responsible step taken by the exchange to protect assets. Staying informed through official channels is the best course of action during this period. The crypto world is dynamic, and such challenges often pave the way for stronger, more reliable systems in the future. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Why did Upbit suspend POKT deposits and withdrawals? A: Upbit suspended POKT deposits and withdrawals due to a complete halt in Pocket Network’s block production, which prevents new transactions from being processed. Q2: Are my POKT tokens on Upbit safe during this suspension? A: Yes, your POKT holdings on Upbit remain secure. The issue is with the Pocket Network itself, not with Upbit’s security infrastructure. Q3: What does a ‘block production halt’ mean for Pocket Network? A: A block production halt means the Pocket Network blockchain is not creating new blocks, effectively stopping all new transaction confirmations and rendering the network unresponsive. Q4: When will POKT deposits and withdrawals resume on Upbit? A: The resumption depends on when the Pocket Network team resolves its block production issues. Upbit will announce the resumption once the network is stable and operations can safely proceed. Q5: What should POKT holders do during this suspension? A: POKT holders should monitor Upbit’s official announcements and Pocket Network’s communication channels for updates and avoid relying on unverified information. If you found this article helpful in understanding the Upbit POKT suspension, please consider sharing it with your network on social media. Your insights can help other crypto enthusiasts stay informed and navigate these dynamic market changes. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping decentralized networks and their future stability . This post Urgent Alert: Upbit Halts POKT Deposits and Withdrawals Amid Network Freeze first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: The Fed Just Changed Everything For Crypto, Says Top Trader
body: The Federal Reserve’s first rate cut of 2025 has landed—25 basis points on September 17—and, in Trader Mayne’s telling, that removes the last macro “X-factor” hanging over the crypto market. In a video analysis posted the same day, the veteran price-action trader argued that with the policy move now in the rear-view mirror, crypto can “just focus on the charts,” sketching a roadmap in which Bitcoin posts one more leg higher into new all-time highs before a pullback ushers in a classic altseason blow-off. “We had FOMC today and the rates got cut finally… It’s 25 basis points,” he said. “Now the market’s going to digest it.” Where Is Bitcoin Price Going Next? The policy backdrop he’s reacting to is straightforward: the FOMC lowered the fed funds target range by a quarter point to 4.00%–4.25% on Sept. 17, with Chair Jerome Powell describing the move as a risk-management response to weakening labor dynamics and leaving the door open to additional easing this year. The decision drew an 11–1 vote, with newly appointed Governor Stephen Miran dissenting in favor of a larger, 50 bps cut—an unusually hawkish dissent in a dovish direction—while the Board’s implementation note reset key administered rates effective Sept. 18. Markets read the statement and projections as signaling scope for further cuts into year-end. Related Reading: Crucial Ten Days Ahead For Crypto: Will They Ignite Mega Altcoin Season? From here, Mayne’s framework is unapologetically technical. He characterizes Bitcoin’s most recent upswing as corrective relative to the prior impulse and expects price to “push above the mid-range” toward a range high around $120,000–$121,000, where he will watch for rejection at a higher-time-frame confluence defined by a weekly swing-failure pattern (SFP) and an H12 breaker. If momentum stalls there, he plans to short into a washout to clear out built-up leverage—“HYPE made another all-time high today. PUMP has tripled in the last two weeks… there’s some leverage in the system”—and then buy the dip for what he calls the last parabolic leg of the cycle. “Any sort of dip on BTC, I want to be looking for a long,” he said, adding that a shallow retest in the $110,000–$111,000 area or a deeper sweep of recent lows would both be acceptable springboards if the rebound is decisive. If, instead, price grinds through the $120,000 s with no signs of exhaustion, Mayne says he has “no problem” flipping to breakout longs above the all-time high once strength is confirmed intraday—an approach that mirrors his playbook from prior expansions (“Once this thing broke out aggressively… you’re looking for longs”). He emphasizes sequence over prediction: the short he’s eyeing is counter-trend—“a pullback in an uptrend”—and the prime objective remains to position for the next impulsive advance. When Will The Crypto Market Top? Timing-wise, he situates the prospective cycle top in Q4 2025 or Q1 2026, describing a pattern in which Bitcoin’s final vertical leg into the $150,000 to $180,000 region is followed by distribution while altcoins reprice higher—the archetypal altseason. “This parabolic leg I think would be the last leg of the bull run,” he said, before outlining notional alt targets consistent with a late-cycle melt-up: Ethereum $5,000–$7,000, Solana $300–$500, Dogecoin $0.50–$0.70. The mechanics, as he narrates them: a last BTC push, a corrective wash, a V-shaped reclaim of the 2024 ATH “very quickly,” then Q4 “mania” with breadth shifting to large-cap alts as Bitcoin distributes. Related Reading: December 2024 Crypto Crash Signal Returns As Altcoins Go Wild The technical scaffolding behind that view leans on concepts familiar to discretionary price-action traders. Weekly SFPs (failed breaks of prior extremes) set the trap line at range edges; H12 breakers and order blocks frame high-probability reaction zones; and fair-value gaps guide where liquidity vacuums might fill during a corrective flush. On structure, he insists the weekly trend remains up, so any short is tactical and any deeper dip must resolve in a swift V-bottom and reclaim of the former highs to keep the cyclical script intact. His invalidation is equally clear: “If we spend any significant time back below [the 2024 all-time high], it’s really bad… I’m probably going to reassess my thoughts.” Macro, in Mayne’s view, now recedes to the background. The rate cut may have helped pull forward some September strength—“you could argue… the up move we’ve seen on Bitcoin… is in anticipation of this rate cut”—but with the decision made and Powell hinting there “could be another one… there could be two,” his emphasis is squarely on execution: wait for price to trade into the $120,000s and signal weakness for the clean counter-trend short; or, absent weakness, wait for the breakout continuation and ride it. Either way, he’s explicit about the north star for the coming weeks: “Focus on Bitcoin… Any sort of dip on BTC, I want to be looking for a long… Then altseason.” At press time, BTC traded at $117,176. Featured image created with DALL.E, chart from TradingView.com

title: Crypto Ponzi Scheme: US Firm Praetorian Admits to Shocking $200M Fraud
body: BitcoinWorld Crypto Ponzi Scheme: US Firm Praetorian Admits to Shocking $200M Fraud The world of cryptocurrency offers exciting opportunities, but it also carries significant risks. A recent admission from a U.S. investment firm serves as a stark reminder of these dangers. Praetorian Group International has confessed to orchestrating a massive crypto Ponzi scheme , defrauding tens of thousands of unsuspecting investors. This shocking revelation highlights the importance of vigilance in the digital asset space. What Exactly is a Crypto Ponzi Scheme? The Praetorian Case Unpacked A crypto Ponzi scheme operates much like traditional Ponzi schemes, but it leverages the allure and complexity of digital assets. Praetorian Group International, for instance, promised incredibly high daily returns, ranging from 0.5% to 3%. These figures often seemed too good to be true, and unfortunately, they were. The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) investigated Praetorian’s operations from 2019 to October 2021. Their findings confirmed that the firm was not generating returns through legitimate investments. Instead, it was simply paying earlier investors with money collected from newer participants. This classic Ponzi model ultimately collapses when the flow of new money dries up. How Did Praetorian Lure 90,000 Investors Worldwide? Praetorian’s deceptive tactics reached a global audience, ensnaring over 90,000 investors. The firm likely used sophisticated marketing and the promise of quick riches in the booming crypto market to attract victims. Many individuals, eager to participate in the perceived wealth generation of cryptocurrencies, fell prey to these enticing but false claims. Exaggerated Returns: Daily profits of up to 3% are virtually unheard of in legitimate investments. New Investor Funds: Money from new participants was the sole source of “returns” for existing investors. Lack of Transparency: The firm provided little to no verifiable information about its actual investment strategies. This scheme managed to collect a staggering $201 million in total funds, showcasing the immense scale of the deception. The Cost of Deceit: Luxury Lifestyles Funded by Victims’ Savings While thousands of investors faced significant losses, Praetorian’s CEO enjoyed an extravagant lifestyle. Investigations revealed that the funds siphoned from investors were used for personal enrichment. This included the acquisition of: Luxury homes High-end cars Other lavish goods Such actions are a common hallmark of a fraudulent crypto Ponzi scheme . The perpetrators live lavishly at the expense of their victims’ hard-earned money and financial security. The sentencing for this case is set for February 3, 2026, marking a significant step towards justice. Safeguarding Your Investments: Avoiding a Crypto Ponzi Scheme This unfortunate incident serves as a crucial lesson for anyone navigating the cryptocurrency market. Protecting your investments requires careful due diligence and a healthy dose of skepticism. Here are key actionable insights to help you avoid falling victim to a crypto Ponzi scheme : Be Wary of Guaranteed High Returns: Legitimate investments always carry risk; promises of guaranteed, exceptionally high daily or weekly returns are major red flags. Research Thoroughly: Investigate the firm, its founders, and its investment strategies. Look for verifiable information and regulatory compliance. Understand the Technology: If you don’t understand how an investment generates returns, it’s best to steer clear. Check for Regulatory Scrutiny: Verify if the firm is registered with relevant financial authorities like the SEC. Lessons Learned: Navigating the Crypto Landscape Safely The Praetorian case underscores the critical need for investor education and awareness. The crypto market, while innovative, remains a target for unscrupulous actors. Investors must prioritize security and verify the legitimacy of any platform or project before committing funds. Trusting your instincts and performing diligent research are your best defenses against financial fraud. The admission by Praetorian Group International to running a $200 million crypto Ponzi scheme is a sobering reminder of the persistent threats in the digital asset space. While the pursuit of high returns can be tempting, the devastating consequences of such schemes demand extreme caution. Stay informed, stay vigilant, and always prioritize the security of your investments. Frequently Asked Questions About Crypto Ponzi Schemes Q1: What is the primary characteristic of a crypto Ponzi scheme? A1: The primary characteristic is that returns paid to early investors come from the funds contributed by new investors, rather than from actual legitimate profits generated by investments. These schemes often promise unsustainably high returns. Q2: How can I identify a potential crypto Ponzi scheme? A2: Look for red flags such as guaranteed high returns with little to no risk, complex or vague investment strategies, pressure to recruit new investors, lack of transparency, and unregistered platforms or firms. Q3: Is the cryptocurrency market inherently risky due to schemes like Praetorian’s? A3: While the crypto market can be volatile and attracts fraudsters, it’s not inherently risky. The risks stem from unregulated entities and fraudulent actors. Legitimate crypto projects and platforms exist, but due diligence is crucial. Q4: What role does the SEC play in combating crypto Ponzi schemes? A4: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) actively investigates and prosecutes individuals and firms involved in financial fraud, including those operating crypto Ponzi schemes, to protect investors and maintain market integrity. Q5: What should I do if I suspect I’ve been involved in a crypto Ponzi scheme? A5: If you suspect you’re a victim, immediately cease further investments, gather all documentation, and report the scheme to relevant financial authorities like the SEC or your local regulatory body. Seek legal advice if necessary. Understanding the risks in the crypto market is vital for every investor. If you found this article insightful, please consider sharing it with your network on social media. Your vigilance can help others avoid falling victim to similar scams and promote a safer cryptocurrency environment for everyone. To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin and Ethereum price action. This post Crypto Ponzi Scheme: US Firm Praetorian Admits to Shocking $200M Fraud first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Legal Expert Says Sub-$3.00 XRP Price Is Coming
body: Bill Morgan’s swift reaction on X—“Sorry, there is more good news” followed by the laughing comment, “Sub-$3.00 coming ”—captured the upbeat mood that swept the market after Ripple announced a landmark partnership with DBS Bank and Franklin Templeton. The collaboration will bring repo markets and tokenized money-market trading to the XRP Ledger. Morgan, a well-known legal analyst in the crypto space, posted his remark directly after Ripple’s release and the partners’ statements. Deal Details and Mechanics Franklin Templeton will issue a tokenized money-market fund unit, sgBENJI, on the XRP Ledger. DBS will list sgBENJI alongside Ripple’s RLUSD stablecoin on the DBS Digital Exchange. The three firms explore repurchase agreements and custody models that allow tokenized collateral to serve as credit and short-term funding. DBS confirmed it may accept sgBENJI as repo collateral. According to Lim Wee Kian, CEO of DBS Digital Exchange, the initiative demonstrates the potential of tokenized securities to bring enhanced efficiency and liquidity to markets worldwide, highlighting their transformative impact. It also highlights strong institutional interest . Sorry there is more good news Tokenised money markets to facilitate lending and trading solutions on the XRPL partnering with DBS and Franklin Templeton. You can’t make this up. Sub-$3.00 coming https://t.co/mC2P4cPWrL pic.twitter.com/EoG5eWjNfa — bill morgan (@Belisarius2020) September 18, 2025 Why Institutional Tokenization Matters Bringing money-market exposure onto blockchain technology reduces settlement inefficiencies. It also enables these assets to interact seamlessly with stablecoins, lending platforms, and exchange-traded digital assets, fostering greater integration and functionality. This composability enables programmable yields and can shorten settlement cycles for institutional cash management. The DBS–Franklin–Ripple collaboration is viewed by analysts as part of a larger trend toward tokenization, promising to boost liquidity and operational effectiveness in capital markets. Context and Trendline The partnership follows a steady increase in tokenization projects by major asset managers and global banks, reinforcing a broader shift toward digital representations of cash and short-duration instruments. Regulators and market infrastructure providers are also rolling out frameworks to support safe institutional adoption, signaling that on-chain money markets are transitioning from pilot projects to mainstream use. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Price Implications and Market Sentiment Morgan’s “Sub-$3.00” remark—made while XRP was already trading near $3.10—is clearly tongue-in-cheek. By joking about a dip below a round number during such bullish news, he was mocking persistent skeptics, not predicting a collapse. The laughing emoji underscores the sarcasm and signals his confidence that prices are more likely to climb than fall. His comment is also a sentiment gauge. It reflects growing belief that institutional adoption and new liquidity paths—especially pairing RLUSD with sgBENJI on DBS—could reshape demand for XRP and shift focus from legal risk to practical utility. Traders interpret this as suggesting that any brief move under $3 would be quickly bought, while the broader trajectory remains higher, depending on execution, custody approvals, and actual trading volumes. What to Watch Next Investors are now watching for the official issuance and listing of sgBENJI on the DBS Digital Exchange, the rollout of repo functionality, and early trading volumes that would confirm institutional uptake. If these milestones unfold as planned, Morgan’s light-hearted post could prove prophetic—signaling a market poised for sustained growth rather than a fleeting rally. Ripple’s announcement marks a significant institutional milestone, moving tokenized cash instruments from concept to tradable, yield-bearing products. Morgan’s playful response captures how swiftly market narratives can change when tangible adoption begins to take hold. title: Bitcoin Cash Rallies to Nearly $650, Highest Level Since April 2024
body: Bitcoin's (BTC) offshoot bitcoin cash (BCH) has rallied 7% to $647 in the past 24 hours, revisiting valuations last seen in April 2024, according to data source CoinDesk. The rally follows a period of extreme bearish market sentiment for the token, according to data tracking platform Santiment. "Historically, prices move in the opposite direction of the crowd's expectations. So, implementing a strategy of buying when the crowd is fearful and selling when the crowd gets greedy continues to work extremely well for most altcoins," Santiment said on X, explaining BCH's upswing. The token's rally aligns with the broader risk-on sentiment sparked by Wednesday's Fed rate cut and market expectations for continued liquidity easing in the coming months. Several tokens, including DOT, SUI, JUP, and NEAR, have seen similar gains in the past 24 hours, while smaller coins like PENGU have led the charge with impressive double-digit increases. Possibly greasing the Fed-led bullish market sentiment is the Securities and Exchange Commission's (SEC) decision to approve generic listing standards for commodity and crypto ETFs without undergoing individual reviews for each product. This move is expected to speed up the introduction of new products tied to a variety of tokens in the coming months. BCH’s recent move builds on the bullish breakout confirmed two months ago. In July, its price surged above the upper boundary of a channel pattern formed by trendlines connecting highs from April and December 2024, and lows from August 2024 and April 2025. This breakout from a prolonged period of consolidation suggests that selling pressure has been absorbed, clearing the way for further upside. The immediate resistance to watch is the 2024 high at $719, which could be the next key hurdle for BCH to surpass.

title: Caliber Buys LINK: Nasdaq Firm Makes Significant $6.5M Investment
body: BitcoinWorld Caliber Buys LINK: Nasdaq Firm Makes Significant $6.5M Investment The cryptocurrency world is abuzz with exciting news as Nasdaq-listed company Caliber (NASDAQ: CWD) makes a significant stride into the digital asset space. In a pivotal move, Caliber buys LINK , acquiring a substantial 278,011 Chainlink (LINK) tokens. This impressive $6.5 million investment showcases a growing trend of traditional finance embracing innovative blockchain technologies. What Does Caliber’s Strategic LINK Acquisition Entail? This considerable purchase by Caliber is far from a spontaneous decision; it aligns perfectly with a previously announced corporate strategy. Caliber publicly declared its intention to both acquire and actively stake LINK tokens. This calculated approach by Caliber to buy LINK highlights a deliberate integration of decentralized finance (DeFi) assets into its robust investment portfolio. It signifies a forward-thinking perspective on digital asset management. Caliber’s investment in LINK was executed at an average price of $23.38 per token, reflecting a precise entry point. The details of this significant transaction were officially reported by GlobeNewswire , ensuring transparency. The total value of this acquisition reached a substantial $6.5 million, underscoring its importance. This strategic foresight positions Caliber to potentially capitalize on the growth and utility of the Chainlink network. Why Did Caliber Choose Chainlink (LINK) for This Major Investment? Caliber’s specific decision to target Chainlink (LINK) for this major investment is highly indicative of its strategic vision. Chainlink operates as the industry-leading decentralized oracle network, playing a critical role in bridging real-world data with smart contracts on various blockchains. Its unparalleled security, reliability, and widespread adoption make it an indispensable foundation for countless decentralized applications (dApps) and DeFi protocols. By actively choosing to have Caliber buy LINK and committing to its staking mechanism, the company likely aims to achieve several key objectives: Participate Actively: Engage directly in the network’s security, data provision, and overall operations. Generate Yield: Earn staking rewards, creating a new stream of passive income for the firm. Gain Exposure: Secure a direct foothold in the rapidly expanding decentralized finance ecosystem. This strategic alignment with a cornerstone of Web3 infrastructure demonstrates Caliber’s deep understanding of the long-term value and utility that Chainlink provides to the digital economy. How Does Caliber’s LINK Investment Influence the Crypto Market? The news that Caliber buys LINK has already sent positive ripples across the cryptocurrency market. Immediately following the announcement, LINK tokens experienced a favorable price movement, climbing 4.73% to trade at $24.19, as reported by CoinMarketCap. Such significant institutional acquisitions often serve as powerful validation signals, bolstering confidence across the entire digital asset landscape. When a prominent Nasdaq-listed entity like Caliber makes such a substantial and public investment, it communicates a clear and impactful message to the wider financial world: Legitimacy Boost: It significantly legitimizes digital assets as viable investment classes for other traditional investors and corporations. Catalyst for Adoption: It can inspire further institutional adoption, encouraging more capital inflow into the crypto space. Confidence Reinforcement: It strengthens belief in the fundamental technology and the practical utility offered by projects like Chainlink. This evolving trend strongly suggests a maturing market where cryptocurrencies are increasingly perceived as serious, long-term investment opportunities, moving beyond mere speculative instruments. Navigating the Landscape: Opportunities and Considerations While the benefits of increasing institutional adoption are evident, the cryptocurrency market still presents its unique set of challenges. Market volatility remains an inherent characteristic, and the global regulatory framework continues to evolve. However, for forward-thinking companies like Caliber, the immense opportunities presented by blockchain technology and decentralized finance appear to significantly outweigh these perceived risks. Their carefully calculated entry, beginning with a foundational asset like LINK, exemplifies a prudent yet optimistic approach to integrating digital assets. It highlights a nuanced understanding of the potential for innovation and growth within this dynamic sector. Conclusion: A New Era of Institutional Crypto Engagement In conclusion, Caliber’s significant $6.5 million investment in Chainlink (LINK) represents a pivotal moment for both the company and the broader cryptocurrency market. This strategic move by a Nasdaq-listed firm underscores the accelerating trend of institutional interest and the increasingly sophisticated integration of digital assets into traditional financial portfolios. As Caliber buys LINK and commits to its long-term staking strategy, it not only fortifies Chainlink’s ecosystem but also sends a powerful signal of growing confidence in the future of decentralized technologies. This development is poised to catalyze more mainstream adoption, firmly establishing crypto’s integral role in the evolving global financial landscape. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What is LINK? LINK is the native cryptocurrency of the Chainlink decentralized oracle network. Chainlink enables smart contracts to securely interact with off-chain data, events, and payment systems, making it a vital component for many blockchain applications. Why is Caliber investing in LINK? Caliber’s investment in LINK is strategic. By acquiring and staking LINK, Caliber aims to participate in the Chainlink network’s security, earn staking rewards, and gain exposure to the rapidly growing decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem, aligning with its long-term digital asset strategy. What is a decentralized oracle network? A decentralized oracle network, like Chainlink, provides external, real-world data to smart contracts on a blockchain. Smart contracts are inherently isolated and cannot access off-chain information on their own. Oracles act as secure bridges, feeding necessary data for smart contracts to execute reliably. How does institutional investment impact the crypto market? Institutional investments, such as Caliber’s LINK acquisition, typically bring increased legitimacy, capital, and stability to the crypto market. They signal confidence in digital assets, can attract further mainstream adoption, and often contribute to positive price movements and market maturation. What does “staking LINK” mean? Staking LINK involves locking up LINK tokens to support the operations and security of the Chainlink network. In return for staking, participants can earn rewards, contributing to the decentralization and reliability of the oracle services. Did you find this insight into institutional crypto adoption valuable? Share this article with your network on social media to spread the word about Caliber’s significant move and the evolving landscape of digital finance!
