title: Stellar Blockchain Powers $100M in Tokenized Real Estate with RedSwan
body: The Stellar blockchain network is now being used by RedSwan Digital Real Estate, a FINRA-regulated digital securities marketplace and investment firm, to tokenize $100 million in commercial real estate assets. The portfolio includes institutional-grade multifamily and hospitality properties, showing a transformative step in making real estate investing more accessible and liquid. The announcement was made at the Stellar Meridian event in Copacabana, Rio de Janeiro, on September 18, a flagship annual gathering of blockchain leaders, investors, and policymakers. Unlocking Institutional-Grade Assets for All Investors By using the Stellar’s blockchain infrastructure, RedSwan said it is opening the doors of institutional-quality real estate to a wider investor base. Tokens are minted through the company’s regulatory-compliant Token Studio, allowing fractionalized real estate securities to be distributed seamlessly across borders. This model allows investors worldwide to participate in tokenized real estate opportunities with lower entry requirements, greater transparency, and 24/7 secondary market liquidity, explains RedSwan. “The Stellar network’s architecture aligns perfectly with our mission to unlock real estate investing through blockchain,” said Edward Nwokedi, Founder and CEO of RedSwan. Solving Traditional Barriers in Commercial Real Estate Commercial real estate has historically been one of the most exclusive asset classes, typically reserved for institutional players. High minimum investments, limited liquidity, and opaque ownership structures restricted access for everyday investors. RedSwan’s platform addresses these barriers by offering fractional, compliant security stock shares in premium properties. This reduces the financial barrier to entry while creating liquidity by enabling investors to buy and sell shares in a transparent, regulated marketplace. A Trillion-Dollar Opportunity Through Tokenization According to RedSwan in North America alone, the real estate market represents an estimated $75 trillion in potential assets that could be unlocked through tokenization. The firm explains Tokenization not only democratizes access but also streamlines efficiencies, allowing asset owners to connect with a global investor base at lower costs. This model creates a bridge between institutional real estate and everyday investors seeking stable, long-term returns. Stellar’s Role in Real-World Asset Innovation “Stellar is purpose-built for moving value quickly, securely, and reliably across borders, which is why it is the network of choice for so many real-world assets,” said Denelle Dixon, CEO of the Stellar Development Foundation. “Tokenized real estate is a sector where the Stellar network can support innovation, and RedSwan’s tokenized offerings represent the kind of transformative use case the network was designed for,”adds Dixon. By joining forces, RedSwan and Stellar said they are reshaping financial access—making institutional-grade real estate investment global, affordable, and efficient through blockchain technology. The post Stellar Blockchain Powers $100M in Tokenized Real Estate with RedSwan appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Bitcoin (BTC) Bulls Eye $137K But Only If This Support Holds Strong
body: Bitcoin (BTC) has recorded a mild uptick over the past week as it traded above $117,240. New data suggest that the crypto asset’s path forward depends on $115,440 support. The reaction around this level will likely determine whether Bitcoin extends its rally or slips into a sharper correction. Lose $115K, Face $93K According to crypto analyst Ali Martinez’s latest update, BTC’s Pricing Bands reveal the emergence of $115,440 as the most critical support level for the crypto asset. This threshold now serves as the decisive pivot point for the market’s next major move. If Bitcoin manages to hold above it, momentum could build toward the next upside target at $137,300. This is expected to boost bullish conviction further. However, a breakdown below this zone could expose the market to deeper downside pressure, and even bring $93,600 into focus as the next key support. Meanwhile, Swissblock found that the recent short-term volatility in Bitcoin was repricing risk, and not a market breakdown. According to the firm, testing the lower end of Bitcoin’s current range remains within normal volatility expectations and could be the final downside move before the next major leg higher. Two bullish signals have surfaced that support this outlook – rising liquidity and strong network growth. These signals together have historically led to sharp advances. For example, in February 2024, Bitcoin surged 35% in two weeks, while in November 2024, it rallied 40% in three weeks following similar build-ups. Now, the firm noted that Bitcoin is experiencing the strongest and longest build-up of the entire cycle, and is effectively spring-loading the market for a breakout. Within one to three weeks, they expect new all-time highs for Bitcoin, which could be accompanied by upside rotations in Ethereum and altcoins, fueled by sidelined cash ready to re-enter at lower levels. September Seasonal Drag Nearing End? September has historically been challenging for Bitcoin, but conditions appear to be changing. The crypto asset climbed 3% last week. Bitfinex Alpha report also highlighted that the asset is showing signs of forming a stable base. The momentum is visible across the market as evidenced by the surge in the total crypto capitalization, while on-chain buy pressure and Cost Basis Distribution (CBD) metrics further point to a strong investor participation, which could position Bitcoin for a potential breakout into Q4. title: Revolutionary Stablecoin Payment Technology: BC Card’s Bold Leap in South Korea
body: BitcoinWorld Revolutionary Stablecoin Payment Technology: BC Card’s Bold Leap in South Korea Imagine a world where your digital currency works just as smoothly as your credit card. That future is getting closer, thanks to a significant move by South Korea’s BC Card. The company has filed a patent for a cutting-edge stablecoin payment technology , signaling a bold step towards integrating digital assets into our everyday financial lives. This development isn’t just about accepting cryptocurrencies; it’s about making them practical and reliable for daily use. BC Card’s innovation could truly revolutionize how we think about spending digital money, bringing stability and real-time accuracy to transactions. What is BC Card’s Groundbreaking Stablecoin Payment Technology? At its core, BC Card’s patented system introduces a clever way to handle stablecoin transactions. It focuses on determining the exact amount to deduct from a user’s digital wallet. How does it do this? It reflects real-time market data at the moment a merchant transaction occurs. This ensures that the value of the stablecoin being spent accurately matches the price of goods or services. This real-time adjustment is crucial. It addresses a major concern in the crypto world: price volatility. By tying the deduction to live market conditions, BC Card aims to provide a seamless and fair transaction experience, making stablecoin payment technology a more attractive option for both consumers and businesses. Why is This Stablecoin Payment Technology a Game-Changer for Payments? BC Card’s initiative carries immense potential, especially in a market as tech-forward as South Korea. This move signifies a broader acceptance and integration of digital assets into the mainstream financial system. Here are some key benefits this stablecoin payment technology could bring: Enhanced Stability: Stablecoins, by design, aim to maintain a stable value, often pegged to fiat currencies like the US dollar. Integrating them into payments means less risk of value fluctuations during a transaction. Real-time Accuracy: The system’s ability to reflect real-time market data ensures transparency and fairness for all parties involved. Broader Accessibility: By bridging the gap between digital wallets and traditional payment networks, it opens up stablecoin usage to a wider audience who may not be familiar with complex crypto exchanges. This isn’t just about a new way to pay; it’s about expanding financial inclusion and offering more choices to consumers in the digital age. How Will This Stablecoin Payment Technology Integrate with Existing Systems? BC Card understands that success lies in collaboration and integration. The company has clear plans to build a robust infrastructure by partnering with various entities: Financial Firms: Traditional banks and financial institutions will play a key role in ensuring regulatory compliance and broader adoption. Fintech Companies: Innovative technology firms will help develop and refine the user experience and underlying technical solutions. Virtual Asset Service Providers (VASPs): These crypto-native companies will provide the necessary expertise in handling digital assets securely. The goal is to weave stablecoins into familiar payment methods. Think about using stablecoins through your existing card network or via QR code payments. Leveraging South Korea’s largest merchant network, BC Card aims to make this integration as smooth and widespread as possible, ensuring the stablecoin payment technology becomes a practical reality for millions. What Challenges Lie Ahead for Stablecoin Payment Technology? While the prospects are exciting, implementing such an advanced system comes with its own set of challenges. Regulatory frameworks for stablecoins are still evolving globally, and South Korea is no exception. Ensuring consumer protection, preventing illicit activities, and maintaining financial stability will be paramount. Moreover, user adoption will depend on ease of use and clear communication about the benefits. Educating the public about how stablecoin payment technology works and its advantages over traditional methods will be key to its success. Despite these hurdles, BC Card’s proactive approach signals strong confidence in the future of digital currency payments. A Future Where Digital Payments Are Seamless and Stable BC Card’s patent filing for stablecoin payment technology is more than just a technical innovation; it’s a statement about the future of finance. It represents a commitment to making digital assets a practical, stable, and integrated part of our daily spending habits. As collaborations unfold and infrastructure develops, we can anticipate a significant shift in how we conduct transactions, bringing us closer to a truly digital economy. This initiative could set a precedent for other financial institutions worldwide, demonstrating a viable path for integrating cryptocurrencies into the existing financial landscape. The journey ahead will undoubtedly involve overcoming challenges, but the potential rewards—a more efficient, stable, and accessible payment system—are immense. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is a stablecoin? A1: A stablecoin is a type of cryptocurrency designed to maintain a stable value, often pegged to a fiat currency like the US dollar or a commodity, to minimize price volatility. Q2: How does BC Card’s stablecoin payment technology work? A2: The technology determines the final deduction amount from a user’s digital wallet by reflecting real-time market data at the time of a merchant transaction, ensuring accurate value exchange. Q3: Will I be able to use this technology with my existing credit card? A3: BC Card plans to integrate stablecoins into existing payment methods, such as card and QR payments, leveraging South Korea’s largest merchant network, making it potentially accessible through familiar interfaces. Q4: What are the main benefits of using stablecoin payment technology? A4: Key benefits include enhanced transaction stability due to stablecoin’s nature, real-time payment accuracy, and broader accessibility for digital asset users within traditional payment systems. Q5: What role do partnerships play in this initiative? A5: BC Card plans to collaborate with financial firms, fintech companies, and virtual asset service providers to build the necessary infrastructure and ensure seamless integration and regulatory compliance. Q6: Is this technology only for South Korea? A6: While the patent filing is in South Korea and leverages its merchant network, successful implementation could inspire similar initiatives globally, influencing the broader adoption of stablecoin payment technology. Did you find this article insightful? Share it with your friends and colleagues on social media to spread the word about BC Card’s groundbreaking stablecoin payment technology and its potential impact on the future of finance! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping stablecoin payment technology institutional adoption. This post Revolutionary Stablecoin Payment Technology: BC Card’s Bold Leap in South Korea first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: GRVT Raises $19M to Challenge Hyperliquid with Private On-Chain Trading
body: Privacy-focused exchange GRVT has raised $19 million in a Series A round to take on Hyperliquid, the current leader in decentralized perpetual futures. Key Takeaways: GRVT raised $19 million to challenge Hyperliquid with a privacy-first approach backed by ZKsync. The platform uses zero-knowledge tech to hide trade data and protect large positions from manipulation. Alongside privacy, GRVT targets yield-driven growth to attract both active traders and passive investors. The round was led by ZKsync, which contributed $14 million, backing GRVT’s bid to bring institutional-grade privacy to on-chain trading, according to a report by Forbes . While Hyperliquid dominates with a 70% market share and monthly volumes nearing $400 billion, its full-transparency model, where all positions, liquidation levels, and order data are visible, has become a double-edged sword. For Big Traders, On-Chain Transparency Comes at a Cost For large traders moving tens of millions, that visibility creates risks. “We’ve seen those cases where they do get hunted,” said GRVT co-founder and CEO Hong Yea, describing how large positions become targets for manipulation. GRVT’s solution is built on zero-knowledge (ZK) cryptography, allowing traders to operate without exposing sensitive data. Using a “validium” chain, GRVT validates transactions without publishing underlying trading details, position size, entry price, or liquidation levels. This shields traders from front-running and “liquidation sniping,” problems institutional players cite as barriers to on-chain activity. The platform’s privacy pitch is already resonating with large traders. “We’ve had multiple whale traders talking to us because of these privacy elements,” said Yea. GRVT also offers incentives like negative maker fees and future token airdrops, aligning with liquidity providers. But GRVT isn’t only selling privacy, it’s pushing a yield-first strategy. The platform offers products such as fixed-yield instruments, tokenized vaults managed by institutional partners like Ampersan, and tokenized versions of yield-generating assets that can double as trading collateral. AI Alpha Strategy by @Bcubeai standing at: – 87%+ APR – 2.37 Sharpe ratio They're literally carrying my portfolio Link below to check them out pic.twitter.com/hyAQbDw8D6 — Grvt (@grvt_io) September 17, 2025 The model is designed to attract both active traders and passive investors, a dual-target approach rarely seen in decentralized exchanges. GRVT holds regulatory licenses in Bermuda and has integrated with LTP and Coin Routes, signaling clear institutional ambitions. It also secured support from Abu Dhabi-based Further Ventures, whose managing partner called GRVT’s use of ZK “a foundation for institutional-scale markets.” GRVT Faces Uphill Battle as Hyperliquid Expands Its Lead Still, GRVT faces a steep climb. Hyperliquid’s deep liquidity and network effects are powerful, and it’s not standing still—it recently launched vault products and its own stablecoin. Other DEXs are also beginning to experiment with privacy layers and yield strategies, narrowing GRVT’s early-mover advantage. As ZK technology becomes cheaper and more widespread, privacy may become standard rather than standout. Earlier this week, Native Markets secured the USDH ticker for Hyperliquid’s native stablecoin , emerging as the winner in a heated governance vote that drew bids from heavyweights including Paxos and Ethena. The decision, finalized Sunday, followed weeks of speculation and community debate, with Native Markets ultimately pulling ahead after validator commitments and prediction markets heavily favored the team. Ethena, once seen as a top contender, exited the race on Thursday , citing community concerns about its non-native infrastructure. The post GRVT Raises $19M to Challenge Hyperliquid with Private On-Chain Trading appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Altcoin Season Index Surges to 73: Unleashing New Opportunities for Investors
body: BitcoinWorld Altcoin Season Index Surges to 73: Unleashing New Opportunities for Investors The crypto world is buzzing with excitement as CoinMarketCap’s Altcoin Season Index has just climbed two points, reaching a notable 73. This uptick isn’t just a number; it’s a significant indicator that the market might be gearing up for some thrilling changes, potentially ushering in a period where alternative cryptocurrencies could shine brighter than Bitcoin. For many investors, this rising index sparks hopes of substantial gains and a dynamic shift in portfolio performance. What Exactly is the Altcoin Season Index? The Altcoin Season Index is a crucial barometer in the cryptocurrency space, designed to give investors a clear picture of market sentiment. It meticulously tracks the performance of the top 100 cryptocurrencies by market capitalization, carefully excluding stablecoins and wrapped tokens to ensure an accurate representation of genuine market movements. The core of its calculation involves comparing how these selected altcoins have performed against Bitcoin over the past 90 days. An “altcoin season” is officially declared when 75% of these top coins outperform Bitcoin. Therefore, a reading closer to 100 is considered a strong signal that an altcoin season is in full swing, indicating a broad-based rally among these alternative digital assets. Why Does a 73 on the Altcoin Season Index Matter Now? Reaching 73 on the Altcoin Season Index is a pivotal moment, as it brings us tantalizingly close to the 75% threshold needed to officially declare an altcoin season. This isn’t merely a statistical point; it suggests that a significant majority of altcoins are already outperforming Bitcoin, hinting at a potential market rotation where capital flows from the dominant cryptocurrency into a broader array of digital assets. This movement indicates growing investor confidence and interest in projects beyond Bitcoin, opening up new avenues for diversification and potentially higher returns. It’s a clear signal that the market’s focus might be broadening, offering a diverse landscape for exploration and strategic investment. Unlocking Opportunities: The Benefits of an Altcoin Season When the Altcoin Season Index is on the rise, it typically signifies a period where many altcoins experience rapid price appreciation. This can be a goldmine for investors looking for substantial gains and new growth avenues. Higher Growth Potential: Altcoins, especially those with smaller market caps, can offer exponential returns during an altcoin season, often surpassing Bitcoin’s growth percentages. Portfolio Diversification: Investing in a variety of altcoins can help spread risk and capitalize on different market niches, reducing reliance on a single asset. Innovation Showcase: An altcoin season often highlights emerging technologies and innovative projects within the crypto ecosystem, bringing attention to groundbreaking developments. Navigating the Volatility: Risks and Smart Strategies While the prospect of an altcoin season is exciting, it’s crucial to approach it with a clear understanding of the inherent risks. Altcoins are generally more volatile than Bitcoin, and their prices can fluctuate dramatically. This means potential for significant gains, but also for substantial losses if not managed carefully. To navigate this dynamic period successfully, consider these smart strategies: Thorough Research: Always perform your own due diligence (DYOR) on projects, understanding their technology, team, and use case. Diversify Wisely: Don’t put all your eggs in one altcoin basket. Spread your investments across several promising projects. Risk Management: Only invest what you can comfortably afford to lose, and consider setting stop-loss orders. Stay Informed: Keep track of market news, regulatory changes, and project developments to make timely decisions. Preparing Your Portfolio for a Potential Altcoin Season With the Altcoin Season Index climbing, now is an opportune time to review your crypto holdings and strategize. This period demands proactive engagement and informed decision-making to truly capitalize on the market’s shifts. Here are some actionable insights: Identify Promising Projects: Look for altcoins with strong fundamentals, active development, and clear, real-world use cases that address specific market needs. Consider Market Trends: Focus on sectors like Decentralized Finance (DeFi), Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs), or Layer-2 scaling solutions that show strong momentum and innovation. Set Clear Goals: Define your entry and exit strategies to manage expectations and profits, ensuring you have a plan regardless of market direction. The Road Ahead: What’s Next for the Altcoin Season Index? As the Altcoin Season Index inches closer to the 75-point mark, the anticipation within the crypto community is palpable. While no one can predict the future with certainty, the current trajectory suggests a growing appetite for altcoins, potentially leading to a full-fledged altcoin season. This shift could redefine portfolio strategies for many. Staying vigilant and informed will be key to navigating these exciting times. The crypto market is dynamic, and understanding these indicators can provide a significant edge, helping investors make more informed decisions. The recent rise of the Altcoin Season Index to 73 is a powerful signal that the crypto landscape is evolving, presenting both immense opportunities and important considerations for investors. This indicator provides a valuable lens through which to view the market’s health and potential direction. Whether we officially enter a full altcoin season or not, the current momentum underscores the vibrant innovation and diverse investment potential within the broader cryptocurrency ecosystem. Stay informed, stay strategic, and prepare for what promises to be an exciting chapter in the crypto journey. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) What does the Altcoin Season Index measure? The Altcoin Season Index measures the percentage of the top 100 cryptocurrencies (excluding stablecoins and wrapped tokens) that have outperformed Bitcoin over the last 90 days. How is an “altcoin season” officially declared? An altcoin season is officially declared when 75% or more of the top 100 altcoins (excluding stablecoins and wrapped tokens) outperform Bitcoin over a 90-day period. Is an Altcoin Season Index of 73 good for investors? An index of 73 is highly significant as it’s very close to the 75% threshold, suggesting that a large number of altcoins are already performing well against Bitcoin, indicating potential for further gains. What are the risks of investing during an altcoin season? Key risks include high volatility, potential for significant losses, and the increased presence of less legitimate projects. Thorough research and risk management are crucial. How can I prepare my portfolio for a potential altcoin season? Prepare by researching promising projects, diversifying your investments across different altcoins, setting clear entry and exit strategies, and only investing what you can afford to lose. Did you find this analysis of the Altcoin Season Index helpful? Share your thoughts and this article with your fellow crypto enthusiasts on social media to spread the word about these exciting market developments! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping altcoins price action. This post Altcoin Season Index Surges to 73: Unleashing New Opportunities for Investors first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Bitcoin Price Analysis: BTC Targets New Highs as Fed Rate Uncertainty Disappears
body: Bitcoin’s price is quickly recovering and paving its way toward a new all-time high after the Federal Reserve cuts interest rates by a quarter point and signals there are still more to come in the upcoming year. Therefore, investors’ fears are alleviated, and the market is likely to rally further in the coming weeks. By Shayan The Daily Chart Bitcoin’s daily chart demonstrates a clear bounce from the $107K demand zone and a rise back above the 100-day moving average, located around the $113K mark. After yesterday’s Fed rate cut, the asset is continuing its path toward the $124K supply zone, which aligns with the current BTC all-time high. The RSI is also trending above the 50% level, indicating that the momentum has now shifted bullish once again. All these signals point to a potential continuation toward the $124K ATH and likely a further rally toward $130K and even higher. The 4-Hour Chart As the 4-hour chart demonstrates, Bitcoin’s recent rally has occurred after the price successfully broke out of a descending channel, following a swift double bottom rebound at the $108K supply zone. The asset has now swept the liquidity pool above the previous $107K high, which can lead to two possible scenarios. The market can either carry on with the uptrend and attack the $124K area once again, or it can pull back at least to the $112K order block, which is the most notable demand zone nearby. Yet, with the RSI still below the overbought region, the price seemingly has more room to grow before a correction occurs. Sentiment Analysis Open Interest This chart displays the Bitcoin aggregate open interest, which shows the number of open perpetual futures positions. Typically, during bullish market conditions, this metric climbs higher or consolidates, as more and more traders are taking leveraged positions. This is exactly what can be seen on the chart. Meanwhile, another interesting observation is that even with the market going through a short-term correction a few weeks ago, the open interest has yet to drop. While this is generally a bullish sign, it also points to the fact that the futures market might still be overheated. Therefore, there is still the probability for a liquidation cascade to happen in the short term, which could cause a flash crash before the market stabilizes again. The post Bitcoin Price Analysis: BTC Targets New Highs as Fed Rate Uncertainty Disappears appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: SUI Eyes Old ATH After 7% Daily Jump, Is a Big Rally Coming?
body: TL;DR SUI trades near $3.83 after a 7% gain, testing the top of the downtrend channel resistance. The Google-backed protocol by Mysten Labs adds attention as consolidation continues above key support zones. SUI’s TVL holds above $2.1B, with consistent capital inflow and renewed bullish interest from analysts. Price Moves Toward Key Resistance SUI gained 7% in the last 24 hours, reaching $3.83. The trading volume for the same period was over $1.7 billion. Over the past week, the token is up 5%. The price is now testing the top of a downtrend channel that has held since earlier this year. Chart analysis shows that SUI is approaching the upper boundary of the structure. Crypto analyst Rekt Capital said , “SUI is on the cusp of breaking out from this Downtrending Channel (light blue). A breakout would see SUI revisit the old All Time High area.” Notably, the previous high sits near $5.35. SUI has formed a series of higher lows in recent weeks. These moves suggest growing interest from buyers. The top of the channel, near $3.80, is a key area. If the price moves above this level and holds, it may open the way toward higher levels. Source: Rekt Capital/X If the breakout fails, SUI could move back to support near $3.40. Below that, the next range sits between $2.33 and $2.00. This zone acted as a strong base earlier in the year and may do so again if tested. Google Partnership Adds Fuel Recent developments around the SUI network have drawn attention to the project. Google announced its Agents Payments Protocol, built by Mysten Labs, which is the team behind SUI. Analyst Michaël van de Poppe commented, A massive partnership announcement from $SUI as Google has announced the Agents Payments Protocol. This has been built by the Mysten Labs team, the founders of $SUI . $SUI & $WAL are both partners with Google and I think that the ecosystem is ready to do well. Great… pic.twitter.com/BhzMagMudf — Michaël van de Poppe (@CryptoMichNL) September 17, 2025 He also noted the current trend, saying there is “great consolidation before a big breakout.” The price has moved within a tight range for several weeks while forming a clear support structure. Platform Usage Remains Strong SUI’s Total Value Locked (TVL) is $2.116 billion as of September 18, 2025, according to DeFiLlama. TVL reached new highs earlier in the summer and has stayed above $2 billion since then. Source: DeFiLlama Net inflows on the most recent day came in at $3,852. While this is a small figure, overall capital in the ecosystem has remained steady. Analyst Kaleo said , “Still believe it’s only a matter of time before we see SUI break out of the range it’s been accumulating in… and make a run for all time highs vs. BTC.” The post SUI Eyes Old ATH After 7% Daily Jump, Is a Big Rally Coming? appeared first on CryptoPotato .

title: Regulatory Clarity Could Drive 40% of Americans to Adopt DeFi Protocols, Survey Shows
body: Over 40% of Americans express willingness to use decentralized finance (DeFi) protocols once regulatory clarity on crypto privacy emerges, according to a recent survey from crypto advocacy organization the DeFi Education Fund (DEF). The survey , released on September 18, revealed that many Americans feel frustrated with traditional financial institutions and seek greater control over their financial assets and data. Respondents believe DeFi innovations can deliver this change by providing affordability, equity, and consumer protection. The survey was conducted with Ipsos on KnowledgePanel and included supplementary in-depth interviews in the Bronx and Queens between August 18 and 21, polling 1,321 US adults. 1/ [ NEW] DeFi Education Foundation is excited to debut a national study by @Ipsos KnowledgePanel and supplemented by in-depth interviews from the Bronx & Queens, NY, providing timely insights into how Americans view the U.S. financial system & emerging tech, like DeFi! pic.twitter.com/wYzcMGER2V — DeFi Education Fund (@fund_defi) September 18, 2025 Survey Results Show Americans Ready to Adopt DeFi Protocols The findings demonstrate that many Americans are curious about DeFi despite its early stage. 42% of Americans indicated they would likely try DeFi if proposed legislation becomes law (9% extremely/very likely and 33% somewhat likely). 84% said they would use it to “ make purchases online ,” while 78% would use it to “ pay bills .” According to the survey, 77% would use DeFi protocols to “ save money ,” and 12% of Americans are “extremely” and “very” interested in learning about DeFi. Moreover, nearly 4 in 10 Americans believe that DeFi can address high transaction and service fees found in traditional finance (39%). Consistent with other probability-based sample surveys, the Ipsos x DEF research shows that almost 1 in 5 Americans (18%) have owned or used crypto at some point in their lifetime. Nearly a quarter of Americans (22%) said they’re interested in learning more about nontraditional forms of finance, such as blockchain, crypto, or decentralized finance. Source: DEF The research shows that more than half (56%) of Americans want to reclaim control of their finances. Americans are interested in having control over their money at all times, and many seek ways to send or receive money without intermediaries. One Bronx, NY resident shared his experience of needing to transfer money between accounts, but the bank required him to certify the transfer and visit in person because he couldn’t move the amount he needed remotely. He expressed frustration about the situation because “ it was my money… I didn’t understand why I was given a hard time. “ More than half of surveyed Americans agree there should be a way to digitally send money to people without third-party involvement, and this number rises notably for foreign-born Americans (66%). The researchers concluded that Americans are interested in DeFi and believe DeFi can reduce friction points in today’s financial system. Regulatory Developments on DeFi Adoption in the U.S Last month, DeFi Education Fund called on the US Senate Banking Committee to rethink how it plans to regulate the decentralized finance industry after reviewing its recently published discussion draft on a key crypto market-structure bill. The response, signed on behalf of DeFi Education Fund (DEF) members including a16z Crypto, Uniswap Labs, and Paradigm, argued the Responsible Financial Innovation Act of 2025 (RFA) bill should be crafted in a more tech-neutral manner. The DeFi Education Fund and Andreeson Horowitz (a16z) are pushing the SEC to create a "safe harbor" for blockchain apps. #DeFi #a16z https://t.co/7OCIWRvUgk — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) August 13, 2025 The group also emphasized that crypto developers should be protected from “ inappropriate regulation meant for intermediaries ,” and that self-custody rights for all Americans are “ essential .” The banking committee is now working on the discussion draft to help ensure it builds on the Digital Asset Market Clarity Act of 2025. The goal is to promote innovation in the $162 billion DeFi industry without compromising consumer protections or financial stability. On September 5, US Federal Reserve Governor Christopher Waller said there was “ nothing to be afraid of ” about crypto payments operating outside the traditional banking system. This statement has raised hopes among many that DeFi would soon become the new financial infrastructure for Americans and the world. The post Regulatory Clarity Could Drive 40% of Americans to Adopt DeFi Protocols, Survey Shows appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Pump.fun Price Prediction 2025-2030: Unveiling PUMP’s Explosive Potential in Solana DeFi
body: BitcoinWorld Pump.fun Price Prediction 2025-2030: Unveiling PUMP’s Explosive Potential in Solana DeFi Are you tracking the dynamic world of Solana’s decentralized finance (DeFi) and the explosive rise of meme coins? Then you’ve likely heard of Pump.fun (PUMP), a platform that has revolutionized how new tokens are launched. In a market teeming with innovation, understanding the future trajectory of projects like PUMP is crucial for any investor. This comprehensive Pump.fun price prediction delves deep into PUMP’s potential, exploring whether it can truly lead Solana’s DeFi boom and what its future might hold between 2025 and 2030. What is Pump.fun and Why Does it Matter for Solana DeFi? Pump.fun is a unique platform built on the Solana blockchain that empowers anyone to launch a new token without needing initial liquidity or coding knowledge. It simplifies the often complex process of creating and distributing cryptocurrencies, primarily focusing on meme coins. The platform operates on a bonding curve mechanism: as more people buy a token, its price increases, and vice versa. If a token reaches a certain market capitalization threshold, it automatically gets listed on Raydium, a major decentralized exchange (DEX) on Solana, with initial liquidity provided by the platform. This innovative approach has several benefits: Accessibility: Lowers the barrier to entry for token creation, fostering creativity and experimentation. Fair Launch: Prevents ‘rug pulls’ often associated with traditional token launches by ensuring liquidity is locked. Community-Driven: Success is determined by organic community interest and buying pressure. Solana Integration: Leverages Solana’s high throughput and low transaction fees, making the process fast and affordable. The significance of Pump.fun extends beyond just meme coins. By providing a robust and secure launchpad, it contributes to the overall vibrancy and liquidity of the Solana DeFi ecosystem, attracting new users and developers to the network. The Rise of Meme Coins and PUMP’s Role Meme coins have evolved from niche internet jokes into a significant, albeit volatile, segment of the cryptocurrency market. Projects like Dogecoin and Shiba Inu have demonstrated the power of community, virality, and speculative interest. Pump.fun capitalizes on this phenomenon by streamlining the creation of such tokens. Historically, launching a meme coin required technical expertise and significant capital for liquidity provision. Pump.fun changes this narrative by: Democratizing Access: Anyone with a few Solana tokens can launch a new project. Reducing Risk: The bonding curve mechanism and automatic Raydium listing with locked liquidity mitigate some of the common risks for early investors. Fostering Innovation: It encourages rapid iteration and experimentation within the meme coin space, leading to new trends and narratives. The platform’s success is intertwined with the continued popularity of meme coins and the broader growth of the Solana network. As more users flock to Solana for its speed and low costs, platforms like Pump.fun become crucial gateways for new projects and liquidity. Analyzing Factors Influencing Pump.fun Price Prediction Predicting the future price of any cryptocurrency, especially one tied to the volatile meme coin sector, involves analyzing a multitude of factors. For our Pump.fun price prediction , we consider both fundamental and technical aspects: 1. Solana Ecosystem Growth Pump.fun’s success is directly correlated with the health and expansion of the Solana blockchain. As Solana continues to attract developers, dApps, and users, the demand for tools and platforms within its ecosystem will naturally increase. A thriving Solana DeFi sector means more potential users for Pump.fun, more tokens launched, and potentially more value for the PUMP token itself. 2. Meme Coin Market Sentiment The meme coin market is highly speculative and driven by trends, social media hype, and community enthusiasm. A general bullish sentiment in the meme coin space could significantly boost activity on Pump.fun, leading to increased demand for the PUMP token. Conversely, a bear market or regulatory crackdowns on meme coins could have a detrimental effect. 3. Platform Development and Features The Pump.fun team’s ability to innovate and introduce new features will be critical. Enhancements to user experience, additional security measures, or integration with other DeFi protocols could attract more users and strengthen the platform’s value proposition. Continuous development ensures Pump.fun remains competitive as a meme coin launchpad . 4. Tokenomics and Utility of PUMP Crypto The native token of the platform, PUMP crypto , needs strong utility to sustain its value. While Pump.fun currently allows anyone to launch tokens, the introduction of a native token, or a clearer utility for one if it exists or is planned, could significantly impact its long-term price. Potential utilities could include governance, reduced fees for launching, staking rewards, or exclusive access to features. 5. Competition and Regulatory Landscape The crypto space is fiercely competitive. New launchpads and token creation tools emerge regularly. Pump.fun must maintain its competitive edge. Furthermore, the evolving regulatory landscape for cryptocurrencies, particularly for meme coins and decentralized finance, could pose challenges or opportunities. PUMP Crypto Tokenomics and Potential Utility Understanding the tokenomics of PUMP crypto is crucial for any long-term forecast. While Pump.fun primarily focuses on enabling the creation of other tokens, the existence of a native PUMP token or a similar value accrual mechanism is key. If PUMP has a defined token, its supply, distribution, and utility will dictate its intrinsic value. Typical utility functions for platform tokens include: Governance: Allowing token holders to vote on platform developments and proposals. Fee Discounts: Offering reduced fees for token launches or trading on the platform. Staking Rewards: Users staking PUMP tokens could earn a portion of platform fees or newly minted tokens. Exclusive Access: Gaining access to premium features, early access to new launches, or higher allocations. If PUMP crypto successfully integrates these utilities, it creates a demand-side pressure that can positively influence its price. Without clear utility, the token’s value might remain purely speculative, making it more susceptible to market sentiment. Will PUMP Lead Solana’s DeFi Boom? A Deeper Look at its Position The question of whether PUMP can lead Solana’s DeFi boom is complex. While Pump.fun undoubtedly contributes to the vibrancy and accessibility of the Solana ecosystem, ‘leading’ a boom implies a foundational role in the core DeFi infrastructure (lending, borrowing, DEXs, stablecoins). Pump.fun’s strength lies in its ability to onboard new projects and users, acting as a crucial entry point for innovation. Here’s how PUMP’s position can be viewed: Catalyst for Innovation: By making token creation easy, Pump.fun fosters a rapid iteration cycle for new projects, some of which may evolve into significant DeFi protocols. Liquidity Provider: The automatic listing on Raydium with locked liquidity adds to Solana’s overall liquidity, benefiting the entire ecosystem. User Acquisition: It brings new users to Solana who might not otherwise engage with the blockchain, introducing them to its speed and low costs. Brand Recognition: A successful meme coin launchpad like Pump.fun enhances Solana’s reputation as an innovative and developer-friendly blockchain. While PUMP might not directly lead in terms of Total Value Locked (TVL) in traditional DeFi protocols, its role as an enabler and incubator for new projects makes it a significant player in Solana’s overall growth narrative. Its impact is more indirect but equally vital, fueling the grassroots expansion of the ecosystem. PUMP Token Forecast 2025-2030: A Multi-Year Outlook Projecting cryptocurrency prices several years into the future involves significant uncertainty. However, by considering the factors discussed, we can formulate a plausible PUMP token forecast . PUMP Price Prediction 2025 By 2025, we anticipate continued growth for Solana and increased adoption of platforms like Pump.fun. If the broader crypto market experiences a bullish trend, and Pump.fun continues to innovate, PUMP could see substantial gains. We might see new features, expanded utility for the PUMP token, and increased institutional interest in the Solana ecosystem. The price could reach a moderate high, potentially establishing a new baseline. PUMP Price Prediction 2026 The year 2026 might bring a period of consolidation or further growth, depending on the overall market cycle. If Pump.fun successfully integrates more advanced features or forms strategic partnerships, its value proposition will strengthen. However, increased competition in the launchpad space could also temper growth. Expect a more stable, yet potentially upward, trajectory if the platform executes its roadmap effectively. PUMP Price Prediction 2027 As the crypto market matures, regulatory clarity might emerge, impacting projects like Pump.fun. If regulations are favorable or provide clear guidelines, it could attract more mainstream users and developers. By 2027, Pump.fun could be a well-established name in the Solana ecosystem, with its token reflecting its utility and market share. Price could continue its upward trend, albeit with expected market volatility. PUMP Price Prediction 2028-2030 Looking further out to 2028-2030, the long-term viability of PUMP will depend on its ability to adapt to technological advancements, maintain its user base, and innovate beyond just meme coins. If Pump.fun evolves into a comprehensive launchpad for various token types, or if the PUMP token gains significant governance power and staking rewards, its value could appreciate considerably. However, sustained growth requires continuous development and a strong community. In a highly bullish scenario, with Solana becoming a dominant blockchain, PUMP could achieve remarkable price levels. Conversely, a failure to adapt or intense competition could lead to stagnation. Plausible PUMP Token Forecast Table (Illustrative) Year Minimum Price ($) Average Price ($) Maximum Price ($) Key Factors 2025 0.005 0.012 0.025 Bull market continuation, Solana ecosystem growth, PUMP feature expansion. 2026 0.008 0.018 0.035 Platform maturation, moderate competition, PUMP token utility. 2027 0.015 0.028 0.050 Regulatory clarity, increased mainstream adoption of Solana, strong community. 2028 0.020 0.040 0.070 Technological advancements, Pump.fun diversification, sustained DeFi growth. 2029 0.030 0.055 0.095 Mass adoption trends, strong PUMP ecosystem, innovative partnerships. 2030 0.040 0.075 0.150 Solana dominance, PUMP as a premier launchpad, widespread crypto adoption. Disclaimer: These predictions are speculative and based on current market trends and potential developments. Cryptocurrency markets are highly volatile, and actual prices may vary significantly. Investors should conduct their own research and consider professional financial advice. Challenges and Risks for PUMP Crypto Despite its innovative approach, Pump.fun and its associated PUMP crypto face several challenges: Market Volatility: Meme coins are inherently volatile. A downturn in the broader crypto market or a loss of interest in meme coins could severely impact PUMP. Competition: The launchpad sector is competitive. New platforms with better features or stronger marketing could emerge, drawing users away from Pump.fun. Regulatory Uncertainty: Governments worldwide are still grappling with how to regulate cryptocurrencies, especially decentralized platforms and meme tokens. Adverse regulations could limit growth or even pose existential threats. Scalability Issues: While Solana is fast, a massive influx of users and token launches could still test its limits, potentially leading to congestion or increased fees. Security Risks: Despite measures to prevent rug pulls, smart contract vulnerabilities or other security exploits could undermine trust in the platform. Investors must weigh these risks against the potential rewards before making any investment decisions related to PUMP. Actionable Insights for Potential PUMP Investors For those considering an investment in PUMP or closely watching its development, here are some actionable insights: Monitor Solana’s Health: Since PUMP is deeply integrated with Solana, keep a close eye on Solana’s network activity, TVL, and overall ecosystem growth. A robust Solana is good for PUMP. Track Meme Coin Trends: Understand the cycles and sentiment within the meme coin market. Periods of high enthusiasm for meme coins often translate to increased activity on platforms like Pump.fun. Research Platform Updates: Stay informed about any new features, partnerships, or utility developments for the PUMP token. These can be significant price drivers. Assess Competition: Keep an eye on other token launchpads, especially those on Solana. Understand their offerings and how Pump.fun maintains its competitive edge. Risk Management: Due to the speculative nature of meme coins and new launchpads, allocate only a small portion of your portfolio that you are comfortable losing. Diversification is key. Community Engagement: A strong and active community is vital for projects like Pump.fun. Engage with the community to gauge sentiment and future direction. Conclusion: Will PUMP Cement its Place in Solana’s Future? Pump.fun has carved a significant niche for itself within the Solana ecosystem, revolutionizing the meme coin launchpad space. By democratizing token creation and providing a safer environment for new projects, it has undoubtedly become a key contributor to Solana’s vibrant DeFi landscape. Our Pump.fun price prediction for 2025-2030 suggests a path of potential growth, contingent on sustained innovation, favorable market conditions, and effective risk management. While PUMP may not lead Solana’s DeFi boom in the traditional sense of TVL, its role as a powerful engine for grassroots innovation and user acquisition cannot be overstated. Its ability to onboard countless new projects and users directly fuels the network’s expansion. The future of PUMP crypto hinges on its continuous evolution, its capacity to introduce compelling utility for its token, and its resilience against market volatility and competition. For investors, PUMP represents an intriguing, albeit high-risk, opportunity within the dynamic and ever-evolving world of Solana DeFi. To learn more about the latest crypto markets trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Solana’s institutional adoption. This post Pump.fun Price Prediction 2025-2030: Unveiling PUMP’s Explosive Potential in Solana DeFi first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Laos Eyes Bitcoin Mining To Tackle Mounting Debt
body: Laos is exploring a new way to service the debts from its decades-long hydropower build-out: turning excess electricity into Bitcoin. In a report published on September 17, the South China Morning Post framed the pivot bluntly: “Saddled with debt and surplus electricity, the ‘battery of Southeast Asia’ is eyeing energy-intensive crypto mining to turn a profit.” The article situates the move within a dam-driven development model that has left Laos with power it cannot always sell and a mounting repayment schedule. Why Laos Eyes Bitcoin Mining The policy logic is straightforward. Bitcoin mining converts electrons into a globally liquid asset and can be sited directly at hydropower plants, mitigating transmission bottlenecks and absorbing seasonal surpluses. Laos has promoted electricity exports for years—SCMP notes power accounted for roughly a quarter of the country’s exports last year—yet export deals and grids do not always line up with generation, exacerbating revenue-timing mismatches against hard-currency debt obligations from dam construction. According to SCMP “environmental campaigners view the turn to crypto as symptomatic of a flawed energy policy that has left Laos indebted and unable to offload its surplus power.” The Chinese news report cites Witoon Permpongsacharoen, director of the Mekong Energy and Ecology Network: “Laos allowing electricity to be used for cryptocurrency mining is clearly not something driven by internal conditions. It stems from the fact that Laos is heavily indebted and unable to pay off its debts.” If implemented, this would not be Laos’s first embrace of digital-asset mining. In September 2021, the government launched a pilot program authorizing six firms to mine and trade Bitcoin and cryptocurrencies under regulated power-purchase terms, a move widely read as an attempt to capture miners displaced by China’s crackdown . However, the stance has seesawed amid hydrological stress and grid constraints: in August 2023, the state utility Électricité du Laos (EDL) halted electricity supply to Bitcoin miners citing drought and power shortages; by May 2024, Reuters reported crypto data centers made up “over a third of the country’s power” consumption and contributed to outages, prompting authorities to stop approving new operations even as they weighed proposals to stabilize supply. The fiscal backdrop helps explain the renewed interest. External public debt service is projected by the World Bank to average about $1.3 billion per year over 2025–2028—around 9% of GDP annually—keeping gross financing needs elevated as key hydropower assets are still ramping. Separate reporting this year underscored the strain: a Chinese dam operator initiated a $555 million arbitration against EDL for alleged unpaid dues, highlighting the financial pressures on the state power sector. Yet the “surplus power” narrative is not uniform. Hydropower output is volatile, impacted by erratic rainfall and a warming climate, while export pipelines remain politically and commercially complex. Laos produces surplus electricity in the wet season but must import power from neighboring countries during the dry months. These structural frictions are precisely the niches where mobile, interruptible loads like Bitcoin mines can monetize stranded energy—until the water runs low. Analysts who champion “wasted renewables” see a broader pattern. “Bhutan, Ethiopia, and now Laos use Bitcoin mining to monetize wasted renewable energy,” Bitcoin climate activist Daniel Batten wrote via X as coverage of the SCMP story circulated, casting the strategy as part of a 2025 “vibe shift.” Bhutan has openly leaned into hydro-powered mining this year, calling bitcoin “a strategic battery” to arbitrage seasonal surpluses and fund development; Ethiopia’s power utility has said it generated about $55 million over 10 months by selling surplus hydro to miners. Laos’s plan would slot into that template, albeit with more fragile hydrology and balance-sheet constraints. At press time, BTC traded at $117,228.

title: SEC Approves! Paving the Way for Altcoin ETFs: New Decision Closely Concerns 12 Altcoins Including XRP!
body: At the end of July, the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) announced new rules outlining general listing standards for cryptocurrency ETPs. While it was stated that the approval of these rules would pave the way for the approval of ETFs pending before the SEC, the expected approval from the SEC has come. Accordingly, the SEC approved general listing standards for commodity-based exchange-traded funds (ETFs). This approval is also critical for altcoins awaiting approval from the SEC. For the SEC to approve, altcoins applying for a spot ETF will need to be traded on an authorized futures market for at least six months. At this point, when the SEC first published these rules, Bloomberg senior ETF analyst Eric Balchunas said that all altcoins that have been traded on the derivatives exchange of Coinbase, the largest US exchange, for more than six months would be eligible for a spot ETF. Balchunas listed the altcoins that meet this requirement and are currently traded on the Coinbase futures platform as follows: “Litecoin (LTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), Dogecoin (DOGE), Polkadot (DOT), Shiba Inu (SHIB), Avalanche (AVAX), Chainlink (LINK), Stellar (XLM), Solana (SOL), Hedera (HBAR), Cardano (ADA), and XRP.” Related News: SEC Announces New Rules for Altcoin ETFs! Which Altcoins Can Be Approved? Here's the List! Eric Balchunas stated that the adoption of general listing standards following the SEC's approval could trigger a wave of approvals in the crypto ETP market. He noted that the number of ETFs approved by the SEC doubled the last time it implemented a similar standard, and predicted that more than 100 crypto ETFs could launch in the next 12 months. *This is not investment advice. Continue Reading: SEC Approves! Paving the Way for Altcoin ETFs: New Decision Closely Concerns 12 Altcoins Including XRP!

title: Trump Jr.-Linked Thumzup Stock Sinks 7.7% After $2M Dogecoin Bet
body: Thumzup Media Corporation’s stock fell sharply on Wednesday after the company disclosed a $2 million investment in Dogecoin, showing its deepening interest in cryptocurrencies and digital asset infrastructure. The Nasdaq-listed firm announced on Thursday that it had purchased about 7.5 million Dogecoin tokens at a weighted average price of $0.2665, marking its first open-market DOGE acquisition. Thumzup Media Corporation is significantly increasing its focus on Dogecoin, most recently acquiring 7.5 million Doge for $2 million after plans were announced to acquire DogeHash, a Dogecoin mining operation with 2,500 rigs. pic.twitter.com/UtJiPJm8vq — KrissPax (@krisspax) September 18, 2025 The move comes as Thumzup prepares to expand into large-scale Dogecoin mining through its pending acquisition of Dogehash Technologies. Thumzup Deepens Digital Asset Pivot With Dogecoin Mining and Treasury Strategy Despite the announcement, shares of Thumzup closed down 7.7% at $4.61 on Wednesday. The stock recovered about 4.5% in after-hours trading following the filing. The price of Dogecoin, meanwhile, rose 5.4% to $0.28, according to CoinGecko. Source: Google Finance Thumzup’s pivot toward Dogecoin has accelerated in recent months. Earlier this month, the company revealed plans to deploy 3,500 mining rigs by the end of the year , following its agreement to acquire Dogehash. Dogehash currently operates around 2,500 Scrypt ASIC miners across North America, focused on producing Dogecoin and Litecoin, with another 1,000 rigs expected later in 2025. Trump-linked Thumzup is acquiring Dogehash, a Dogecoin mining operation, with plans to list as Dogehash Technologies Holdings. #Thumzup #Dogecoin https://t.co/qfqYdP8aOt — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) August 20, 2025 Pending shareholder approval, the deal will see Dogehash shareholders swap their holdings for 30.7 million Thumzup shares, after which the merged entity will rebrand as Dogehash Technologies Holdings and trade under the ticker XDOG. To support its expansion, Thumzup has also strengthened its leadership. This week it appointed Jordan Jefferson , CEO and co-founder of DogeOS and head of the Dogecoin wallet MyDoge, to its Crypto Advisory Board, alongside DogeOS executive Alex Hoffman. Jefferson, whose DogeOS platform is backed by Polychain Capital, has been active in Bitcoin and blockchain development since 2011. He said Thumzup’s strategy of deploying its DOGE holdings into the ecosystem rather than simply storing them could help strengthen the Dogecoin economy. The company’s chief executive, Robert Steele, said Jefferson’s appointment shows Thumzup’s commitment to expanding its role in digital assets, citing his leadership in building applications that increase the utility of Dogecoin. Thumzup has rapidly reshaped itself from a social media marketing firm into a crypto-focused company. Founded in 2020 and based in Los Angeles, the firm originally operated a platform that rewarded users with cash for promoting branded content on social media. In January, it launched a crypto treasury with a $1 million investment in Bitcoin and has since diversified its holdings. By July, its board authorized the company to hold up to $250 million worth of cryptocurrencies , including Bitcoin, Ether, Solana, XRP, Dogecoin, Litecoin, and USDC. @thumz_up , with @DonaldJTrumpJr as an investor, has received board approval to hold up to $250 million in cryptocurrencies. #Trump #Crypto https://t.co/7Y5TnS5RL9 — Cryptonews.com (@cryptonews) July 18, 2025 In August, Thumzup raised $50 million in a stock offering priced at $10 per share , with proceeds directed toward crypto mining infrastructure and targeted blockchain investments. The company reported holding 19.1 BTC as of mid-year and said it intends to diversify further into major tokens. Thumzup’s investor base also drew attention in July when it was revealed that Donald Trump Jr., son of former U.S. President Donald Trump, owns 350,000 shares of the company . Notably, the stake was acquired on the advice of an investment adviser, and Trump Jr. holds no role in management or operations. Dogecoin Climbs Ahead of First-Ever US ETF Launch Dogecoin traded at $0.28 on Thursday, recovering 12% from a local low of $0.25 earlier this week. The token remains nearly 62% below its all-time high of $0.7316, reached in May 2021. The rebound comes as the first Dogecoin exchange-traded fund (ETF) prepares to launch in the United States. The REX-Osprey Dogecoin ETF debuts Thursday, becoming the first regulated product dedicated to a memecoin. Launching Tomorrow: REX-Osprey XRP ETF, $XRPR , & REX-Osprey DOGE ETF, $DOJE . The first U.S.-listed ETFs offering spot exposure to $XRP and $DOGE go live tomorrow, offering investors a way to access these digital assets through an ETF structure. Brought to you by… pic.twitter.com/NbyQqEs1YQ — REX Shares (@REXShares) September 17, 2025 Sponsored by REX Shares and Osprey Funds, the team behind the Solana Staking ETF earlier this year, the product was filed under the Investment Company Act of 1940, allowing for faster approval than traditional Securities Act filings. Analysts say the ETF could channel institutional capital into the Dogecoin market while granting broader legitimacy to an asset once considered a novelty. “The first ever DOGE ETF is launching tomorrow,” ETF Store president Nate Geraci wrote on X, predicting “wild” months ahead. Influencer SMC Kapil DEV called the debut a milestone for Wall Street, adding that Dogecoin is shifting “from a memecoin to a mainstream asset.” The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission is also reviewing applications for spot DOGE ETFs , including Grayscale’s proposal to convert its Dogecoin Trust. A decision on that filing is expected by mid-October. Betting platform Polymarket shows traders assigning a 98% chance of approval for a spot DOGE ETF in 2025. Technical indicators back the optimism. Chart data shows Dogecoin broke out of a symmetrical triangle pattern in early September, rallying toward $0.30. Immediate resistance sits at $0.30–$0.35, with support near $0.26–$0.25. Source: X/Scofield Analysts say holding above that range could pave the way for a push toward $0.35–$0.40, while a breakdown below $0.25 would invalidate the bullish trend. The post Trump Jr.-Linked Thumzup Stock Sinks 7.7% After $2M Dogecoin Bet appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Bitwise presenta alla SEC un nuovo fondo che unisce azioni e crypto legate a stablecoin e tokenizzazione
body: Bitwise Asset Management ha depositato presso la Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) la documentazione per un nuovo fondo che combina azioni e asset crypto legati a stablecoin e tokenizzazione . Secondo i report , se approvata, la proposta segnerebbe uno dei primi prodotti statunitensi a tracciare direttamente entrambi i settori sotto un unico veicolo finanziario. Due Comparti, Peso Uguale Il report descrive un prodotto suddiviso in due parti uguali . Una metà detenuta in azioni di società quotate coinvolte in stablecoin o tokenizzazione (emittenti, società di pagamenti o exchange ). L’altra metà con esposizione ad asset digitali tramite prodotti regolamentati scambiati in borsa, coprendo Bitcoin , Ethereum , oracoli e infrastrutture blockchain. Sono previsti dei limiti nella struttura: Nessuna singola posizione crypto potrà pesare oltre il 22,5% del comparto dedicato agli asset digitali. Sul lato azionario, le aziende verranno classificate in base al grado di coinvolgimento in stablecoin o tokenizzazione, con un tetto massimo per ogni livello per evitare eccessiva concentrazione. Cambiamento normativo apre la strada Questa mossa segue l’approvazione del GENIUS Act a luglio 2025, una legge che ha introdotto maggiore chiarezza sulle regole per le stablecoin. Tale normativa viene accreditata come il catalizzatore che ha aperto la strada a fondi come quello di Bitwise, che potrebbe debuttare sul mercato già a novembre 2025 , se riceverà l’approvazione. Bitwise w a new filing for a Stablecoin & Tokenization ETF which will have sleeve of equities and crypto assets seen benefiting from those two trends. 40 Act so prob launch around Thanksgiving pic.twitter.com/TkTLE91H9H — Eric Balchunas (@EricBalchunas) September 16, 2025 Gli analisti sottolineano che il tempismo non è casuale: la circolazione delle stablecoin ha raggiunto quest’anno centinaia di miliardi di dollari, mentre i real world assets (RWA) tokenizzati stanno salendo a decine di miliardi. Bitwise sembra puntare sulla crescente domanda degli investitori per un punto d’ingresso regolamentato in entrambe le categorie. Bilanciare rischio e domanda L’ETF verrebbe registrato ai sensi dell’ Investment Company Act del 1940 , la stessa legge che regola la maggior parte dei fondi comuni.Il riequilibrio avverrebbe quattro volte l’anno , permettendo al fondo di adattarsi ai movimenti di prezzo o all’ingresso di nuovi attori sul mercato. La mossa di Bitwise non rappresenta solo un’altra richiesta di ETF, ma segnala un passo verso l’integrazione diretta di stablecoin e tokenizzazione a Wall Street , affiancando equity tradizionali ed esposizione crypto regolamentata. Indipendentemente dall’approvazione dei regolatori, il filing dimostra con chiarezza la rapidità con cui gli asset digitali stanno diventando parte integrante dei prodotti finanziari mainstream.

title: The XRP Endgame: Everything Is Aligning at Once
body: Crypto commentator Pumpius has released a detailed thread describing what he characterizes as a convergence of developments surrounding Ripple and XRP. In his view, multiple structural shifts in finance, regulation, and technology are aligning simultaneously, positioning XRP at the center of institutional adoption . Pumpius presented the information as a map of interlinked events and frameworks rather than speculation, indicating regulatory clarity, banking integration, stablecoin infrastructure, settlement systems, and broader policy momentum. The XRP Endgame: Everything Is Aligning at Once What I’m about to lay out isn’t hype, it’s a map of tectonic shifts converging around Ripple & $XRP . If you don’t see the magnitude after this thread, you’re not paying attention. pic.twitter.com/FZRCjDd0Re — Pumpius (@pumpius) September 16, 2025 DTCC Patent and Settlement Systems One of the central elements of Pumpius’ argument is a patent filed by the Depository Trust & Clearing Corporation (DTCC), the world’s largest settlement utility. He emphasized that the DTCC processes between $2 trillion and $4 quadrillion in annual settlements and that the patent explicitly references XRP in its liquidity tokenization design. Pumpius stated that this highlights how Ripple’s infrastructure has been incorporated into blueprints for future settlement rails, indicating a potential alignment between XRP and global clearing operations. Regulatory and Legal Clarity According to Pumpius, XRP holds a unique legal status in the United States after Ripple’s multi-year legal battle with the Securities and Exchange Commission. He underscored that the case outcome granted XRP legal clarity , which he argued places it ahead of other digital assets that continue to face lawsuits and regulatory ambiguity. In his assessment, this positions XRP as a safe option for institutional entities seeking to enter digital asset markets without exposure to uncertain regulatory risk. Pumpius also highlighted Ripple’s launch of RLUSD , its enterprise-grade U.S. dollar-backed stablecoin. He noted that reserves for RLUSD are held at BNY Mellon, a custodian managing over $53 trillion in assets and widely recognized as a key partner for institutions such as BlackRock and the U.S. Treasury. He described this connection as providing XRP with a strong reserve-backed liquidity layer, enhancing Ripple’s settlement infrastructure through the integration of a stable value asset. Banking Ambitions and Federal Reserve Access In the thread, Pumpius drew attention to Ripple’s application for a New York banking charter , describing it as one of the most challenging licenses to obtain. He linked this to Ripple’s existing Money Services Business and Electronic Money Institution licenses, framing the company’s trajectory as one moving toward full-scale global banking capabilities. He further noted that Ripple has applied for access to a Federal Reserve Master Account, which would provide direct access to the U.S. settlement system. According to Pumpius, such access would elevate Ripple and XRP beyond competition with banks to a position of direct integration. We are on X, follow us to connect with us :- @TimesTabloid1 — TimesTabloid (@TimesTabloid1) June 15, 2025 Institutional Investment Pathways Pumpius stated that nearly 20 spot XRP exchange-traded funds have been filed. He described approval of such products as an event that could open pathways for institutional capital to enter the market at scale. In his view, this would shift XRP from being perceived as an undervalued altcoin to becoming an asset class that Wall Street could adopt. The thread also noted that by November, global banking institutions must comply with ISO 20022 messaging standards. Pumpius pointed out that XRP has been compliant for years, meaning its infrastructure is already aligned with the migration. He suggested that this transition will enable RippleNet’s systems to integrate more seamlessly with legacy financial messaging frameworks. Policy Environment and Legislative Alignment Pumpius highlighted what he described as a favorable political and regulatory environment in the United States, with measures such as the Clarity Act, Genius Act, and Blockchain Act advancing. He noted that for the first time, policy appears to be aligning with Ripple’s operational strategy, reinforcing the wider convergence of developments he outlined. Identity Integration Through DNA Protocol Another element in Pumpius’ map is DNA Protocol, a project building biometric and genomic identity verification solutions on the XRP Ledger. He stated that this technology would enable compliance with Know Your Customer requirements at a molecular level, situating XRP as a platform not only for financial transactions but also for identity management in digital frameworks. Pumpius concluded his thread by emphasizing that these developments are unfolding simultaneously. He listed legal clarity, banking licenses, stablecoin integration, ETF filings, ISO 20022 alignment, Federal Reserve applications, DTCC engagement, supportive policy measures, and identity solutions as components of what he termed “the convergence.” He argues that the alignment of these factors marks a critical point in XRP’s evolution from digital asset to institutional infrastructure. Disclaimer : This content is meant to inform and should not be considered financial advice. The views expressed in this article may include the author’s personal opinions and do not represent Times Tabloid’s opinion. Readers are advised to conduct thorough research before making any investment decisions. Any action taken by the reader is strictly at their own risk. Times Tabloid is not responsible for any financial losses. title: Momentous Plasma Mainnet Launch: Unveiling XPL on September 25
body: BitcoinWorld Momentous Plasma Mainnet Launch: Unveiling XPL on September 25 Get ready for a pivotal moment in the crypto world! The highly anticipated Plasma mainnet launch , along with its native token XPL, is officially set to go live on September 25. This development marks a significant milestone for the stablecoin project, promising new horizons and functionalities for users and the broader decentralized finance (DeFi) ecosystem. What’s the Buzz Around the Plasma Mainnet Launch? For those tracking the stablecoin space, Plasma has been a project to watch. A mainnet launch is essentially the point where a blockchain network transitions from its test phases to a fully operational, live environment. It’s when the network becomes real, processing actual transactions and hosting dApps. The upcoming Plasma mainnet launch is not just a technical upgrade; it’s the foundation for its long-term vision. The native token, XPL, will play a crucial role within this new ecosystem. It’s designed to facilitate various functions, from governance to transaction fees, ensuring the smooth operation and decentralization of the Plasma network. This launch is a testament to years of development and community anticipation. Why is XPL So Important for Plasma’s Ecosystem? Every robust blockchain needs a native token to power its operations, and XPL is no exception. Here’s why XPL is integral to the Plasma ecosystem: Governance: XPL holders will likely have a say in the future direction of the Plasma protocol, participating in voting on key proposals and upgrades. This ensures a truly decentralized decision-making process. Transaction Fees: Similar to ‘gas’ on Ethereum, XPL will be used to pay for transactions and computational services on the Plasma network. This mechanism ensures network security and helps prevent spam. Staking and Rewards: While specifics are often detailed closer to launch, native tokens frequently offer staking opportunities. Users can earn rewards by contributing to network security and stability. The introduction of XPL alongside the Plasma mainnet launch is a strategic move to foster a truly decentralized and community-driven platform. It empowers users and aligns incentives, which is crucial for sustainable growth. What Benefits Can Users Expect from the New Plasma Mainnet? The transition to a live mainnet brings a host of advantages for users and developers alike. This isn’t just about a new token; it’s about a more robust, efficient, and feature-rich platform. Consequently, users can look forward to several key benefits: Increased Stability and Security: A fully operational mainnet implies a more secure and stable environment for stablecoin operations, which is critical for all financial applications. Enhanced Scalability: Plasma aims to offer improved transaction speeds and lower costs compared to some existing blockchain networks, directly addressing common pain points in decentralized finance. Developer Opportunities: With the mainnet live, developers can begin building and deploying decentralized applications (dApps) on Plasma. This will foster innovation and expand the utility within its ecosystem. Broader Adoption: A stable and scalable platform can attract more users and institutional interest, potentially expanding the reach and utility of Plasma’s stablecoin offerings across the globe. This significant Plasma mainnet launch sets the stage for a new era of decentralized finance, emphasizing efficiency and user experience. However, like any major technological rollout, there may be initial periods requiring monitoring for bugs, optimizing network performance, and ensuring seamless integration for partners. The Plasma team will undoubtedly focus on a smooth rollout and addressing any issues promptly. The upcoming Plasma mainnet launch on September 25, complete with its native XPL token, represents a monumental step forward for the project. It signifies the culmination of extensive development and the beginning of a new chapter for decentralized stablecoins. As the crypto community eagerly awaits, this launch promises to introduce a more robust, scalable, and community-driven platform, poised to make a significant impact on the future of finance. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is Plasma? A: Plasma is a stablecoin project aiming to provide a robust and scalable platform for decentralized financial applications. It focuses on creating a stable digital asset environment within the blockchain ecosystem. Q2: What is a mainnet launch in cryptocurrency? A: A mainnet launch is when a blockchain network moves from its testing phases to a fully live, operational environment. It means the network is ready to process real transactions and host decentralized applications. Q3: What is XPL and what is its utility? A: XPL is the native token of the Plasma network. It will be used for various purposes, including paying transaction fees, participating in network governance, and potentially for staking to secure the network and earn rewards. Q4: When is the Plasma mainnet launch scheduled? A: The Plasma mainnet launch , along with its native token XPL, is scheduled to go live on September 25. Q5: How can I get involved with the Plasma ecosystem? A: As the mainnet launches, opportunities for involvement will expand. This may include holding XPL tokens, participating in governance, using dApps built on Plasma, or even developing on the platform. Keep an eye on Plasma’s official channels for more details. The crypto world is constantly evolving, and the Plasma mainnet launch is a prime example of this innovation. Share this article with your network to spread the word about this exciting development and spark conversations about the future of stablecoins and decentralized finance! To learn more about the latest crypto market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping the crypto market’s institutional adoption.
