Atlassian’s Monumental DX Acquisition: Revolutionizing Developer Productivity for a Billion-Dollar Future
body: BitcoinWorld Atlassian’s Monumental DX Acquisition: Revolutionizing Developer Productivity for a Billion-Dollar Future In a move that sends ripples across the tech industry, impacting everything from foundational infrastructure to the cutting-edge innovations seen in blockchain and cryptocurrency development, productivity software giant Atlassian has made its largest acquisition to date. This isn’t just another corporate buyout; it’s a strategic investment in the very fabric of how software is built. The Atlassian acquisition of DX, a pioneering developer productivity platform, for a staggering $1 billion, signals a profound commitment to optimizing engineering workflows and understanding the true pulse of development teams. For those invested in the efficiency and scalability of digital ecosystems, this development underscores the growing importance of robust tooling at every layer. Unpacking the Monumental Atlassian Acquisition : A Billion-Dollar Bet on Developer Efficiency On a recent Thursday, Atlassian officially announced its agreement to acquire DX for $1 billion, a sum comprising both cash and restricted stock. This substantial investment highlights Atlassian’s belief in the critical role of developer insights in today’s fast-paced tech landscape. For years, Atlassian has been synonymous with collaboration and project management tools, powering teams worldwide with products like Jira, Confluence, and Trello. However, recognizing a growing need, the company has now decisively moved to integrate a dedicated developer productivity insight platform into its formidable product suite. This acquisition isn’t merely about expanding market share; it’s about deepening Atlassian’s value proposition by providing comprehensive visibility into the health and efficiency of engineering operations. The strategic rationale behind this billion-dollar move is multifaceted. Atlassian co-founder and CEO Mike Cannon-Brookes shared with Bitcoin World that after a three-year attempt to build an in-house developer productivity insight tool, his Sydney-based company realized the immense value of an external, existing solution. This candid admission speaks volumes about the complexity and specialized nature of developer productivity measurement. DX emerged as the natural choice, not least because an impressive 90% of DX’s existing customers were already leveraging Atlassian’s project management and collaboration tools. This pre-existing synergy promises a smoother integration and immediate value for a significant portion of the combined customer base. What is the DX Platform and Why is it a Game-Changer? At its core, DX is designed to empower enterprises by providing deep analytics into how productive their engineering teams truly are. More importantly, it helps identify and unblock bottlenecks that can significantly slow down development cycles. Launched five years ago by Abi Noda and Greyson Junggren, DX emerged from a fundamental challenge: the lack of accurate and non-intrusive metrics to understand developer friction. Abi Noda, in a 2022 interview with Bitcoin World, articulated his founding vision: to move beyond superficial metrics that often failed to capture the full picture of engineering challenges. His experience as a product manager at GitHub revealed that traditional measures often felt like surveillance rather than support, leading to skewed perceptions of productivity. DX was built on a different philosophy, focusing on qualitative and quantitative insights that truly reflect what hinders teams, without making developers feel scrutinized. Noda noted, “The assumptions we had about what we needed to help ship products faster were quite different than what the teams and developers were saying was getting in their way.” Since emerging from stealth in 2022, the DX platform has demonstrated remarkable growth, tripling its customer base every year. It now serves over 350 enterprise customers, including industry giants like ADP, Adyen, and GitHub. What makes DX’s success even more impressive is its lean operational model; the company achieved this rapid expansion while raising less than $5 million in venture funding. This efficiency underscores the inherent value and strong market demand for its solution, making it an exceptionally attractive target for Atlassian. Boosting Developer Productivity : Atlassian’s Strategic Vision The acquisition of DX is a clear signal of Atlassian’s strategic intent to not just manage tasks, but to optimize the entire software development lifecycle. By integrating DX’s capabilities, Atlassian aims to offer an end-to-end “flywheel” for engineering teams. This means providing tools that not only facilitate collaboration and project tracking but also offer actionable insights into where processes are breaking down and how they can be improved. Mike Cannon-Brookes elaborated on this synergy, stating, “DX has done an amazing job [of] understanding the qualitative and quantitative aspects of developer productivity and turning that into actions that can improve those companies and give them insights and comparisons to others in their industry, others at their size, etc.” This capability to benchmark and identify specific areas for improvement is invaluable for organizations striving for continuous enhancement. Abi Noda echoed this sentiment, telling Bitcoin World that the combined entities are “better together than apart.” He emphasized how Atlassian’s extensive suite of tools complements the data and information gathered by DX. “We are able to provide customers with that full flywheel to get the data and understand where we are unhealthy,” Noda explained. “They can plug in Atlassian’s tools and solutions to go address those bottlenecks. An end-to-end flywheel that is ultimately what customers want.” This integration promises to create a seamless experience, allowing teams to move from identifying an issue to implementing a solution within a unified ecosystem. The Intersection of Enterprise Software and Emerging Tech Trends This landmark acquisition also highlights a significant trend in the broader enterprise software landscape: a shift towards more intelligent, data-driven solutions that directly impact operational efficiency and competitive advantage. As companies continue to invest heavily in digital transformation, the ability to measure and optimize the output of their most valuable asset — their engineering talent — becomes paramount. DX’s impressive roster of over 350 enterprise customers, including some of the largest and most technologically advanced organizations, is a testament to the universal need for such a platform. These companies recognize that merely tracking tasks isn’t enough; they need to understand the underlying dynamics of their engineering teams to truly unlock their potential. The integration of DX into Atlassian’s ecosystem will likely set a new standard for what enterprise software can offer, pushing competitors to enhance their own productivity insights. Moreover, this move by Atlassian, a global leader in enterprise collaboration, underscores a broader investment thesis in foundational tooling. Just as robust blockchain infrastructure is critical for the future of decentralized finance, powerful and insightful developer tools are essential for the evolution of all software, including the complex applications underpinning Web3. The success of companies like DX, which scale without massive external funding, also resonates with the lean, efficient ethos often celebrated in the crypto space. Navigating the Era of AI Tools : Measuring Impact and ROI Perhaps one of the most compelling aspects of this acquisition, as highlighted by Atlassian’s CEO, is its timely relevance in the era of rapidly advancing AI tools . Mike Cannon-Brookes noted that the rise of AI has created a new imperative for companies to measure its usage and effectiveness. “You suddenly have these budgets that are going up. Is that a good thing? Is that not a good thing? Am I spending the money in the right ways? It’s really, really important and critical.” With AI-powered coding assistants and other generative AI solutions becoming increasingly prevalent in development workflows, organizations are grappling with how to quantify the return on investment (ROI) of these new technologies. DX’s platform can provide the necessary insights to understand if AI tools are genuinely boosting productivity, reducing bottlenecks, or simply adding to complexity. By offering clear data on how AI impacts developer efficiency, DX will help enterprises make smarter, data-driven decisions about their AI investments. This foresight positions Atlassian not just as a provider of developer tools, but as a strategic partner in navigating the complexities of modern software development, particularly as AI integrates more deeply into every facet of the engineering process. It’s about empowering organizations to leverage AI effectively, ensuring that these powerful new tools translate into tangible improvements in output and innovation. The Atlassian acquisition of DX represents a significant milestone for both companies and the broader tech industry. It’s a testament to the growing recognition that developer productivity is not just a buzzword, but a measurable and critical factor in an organization’s success. By combining DX’s powerful insights with Atlassian’s extensive suite of collaboration and project management tools, the merged entity is poised to offer an unparalleled, end-to-end solution for optimizing software development. This strategic move, valued at a billion dollars, underscores Atlassian’s commitment to innovation and its vision for a future where engineering teams are not only efficient but also deeply understood and supported, paving the way for a more productive and insightful era in enterprise software. To learn more about the latest AI market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping AI features. This post Atlassian’s Monumental DX Acquisition: Revolutionizing Developer Productivity for a Billion-Dollar Future first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Bitcoin Price Hits $117K and Could Increase 200x Says Twenty One Capital CEO
body: Bitcoin's 200x Potential: Mallers Predicts Growth Ahead Jack Mallers, the CEO of Twenty One Capital, made an ambitious prediction in a live interview on NYSE TV when he said that the value of Bitcoin (BTC) would rise 200x over the next few years. Mallers said he is confident that Bitcoin can achieve great success, saying that the digital coin is approaching a savings market valued at an unbelievable $400 to $500 trillion, the market that used to be dominated by equities, real estate, and precious metals. According to Mallers, global wealth held across various assets amounts to approximately $900 trillion, with nearly half of it used as a savings mechanism. As more families, investors, and institutions turn to Bitcoin for wealth preservation and protection against inflation, he believes the cryptocurrency could gain a larger portion of this market. “Right now, Bitcoin represents just $2 trillion. In terms of purchasing power, the growth potential is staggering, 100 to 200 times from here,” Mallers explained Mallers’ optimistic forecast comes at a time when Bitcoin is experiencing a strong upward trend in price. At press time, Bitcoin fluctuated between $116,340 and $117,156, showing a steady 0.7% increase in the past 24 hours. This surge also follows the Federal Reserve’s first rate cut of the year, reducing its benchmark rate by 25 basis points to 4-4.25%. This shift in macroeconomic policy has injected further fuel into Bitcoin’s rally. Bitcoin Price. Source: CoinMarketCap Twenty One Capital’s Aggressive Bitcoin Strategy Twenty One Capital is a treasury fund-structured Bitcoin-only investment firm that was founded in April 2025. The company with the support of such large institutional participants as Tether, Bitfinex, and SoftBank has become one of the rare who amassed Bitcoin with their own approach. Since its launch, Twenty One Capital has secured a remarkable 43,514 BTC, surpassing its initial target by about 1,500 BTC. At current market prices, this Bitcoin stash is valued at approximately $5.04 billion. Twenty One Capital has chosen a more conservative course of action, unlike that of Michael Saylor who accumulated substantial debt just to buy Bitcoin. This approach will enable the company to be flexible whenever the market changes, so that it can avoid the market volatility usually experienced by Bitcoin investments. Following a committed strategy, Mallers and Twenty One Capital are establishing themselves as a powerhouse in the Bitcoin treasury reserve market. As the digital asset keeps gaining momentum, it has become more likely than ever to double its value 200x within the value of Bitcoin.

title: Uniswap Price Prediction 2025-2030: Unlocking Astounding Potential for UNI Investment
body: BitcoinWorld Uniswap Price Prediction 2025-2030: Unlocking Astounding Potential for UNI Investment Are you looking at the volatile world of decentralized finance (DeFi) and wondering about the long-term prospects of key players? Specifically, is the Uniswap price prediction for the coming years something to get excited about? Uniswap, a pioneer in decentralized exchanges (DEXs), has captured significant attention since its inception. As we navigate through 2024, many investors are keenly observing UNI’s trajectory, eager to understand if it presents a compelling UNI investment opportunity for the future. This comprehensive guide delves into expert analyses, market trends, and technological advancements to offer a detailed outlook on Uniswap’s potential from 2025 to 2030, helping you make informed decisions. Understanding Uniswap: The Heart of Decentralized Exchange Before diving into predictions, it’s crucial to grasp what Uniswap is and why it matters in the crypto ecosystem. Uniswap is a decentralized exchange protocol built on the Ethereum blockchain. It facilitates automated trading of decentralized finance (DeFi) tokens without the need for traditional intermediaries. Here’s what makes it unique: Automated Market Maker (AMM) Model: Instead of order books, Uniswap uses liquidity pools funded by users. This allows for continuous trading. Permissionless Trading: Anyone can swap tokens or provide liquidity without needing to register or go through KYC. UNI Token: The native governance token of the Uniswap protocol. Holders of UNI can vote on key proposals and future developments of the platform. Innovation: Uniswap has continually evolved, with versions V1, V2, and V3 introducing significant improvements in capital efficiency and flexibility for liquidity providers. Uniswap’s role as a leading DEX positions it at the forefront of the DeFi revolution, making its Uniswap future a topic of great interest for crypto enthusiasts and investors alike. Historical Performance: What Has UNI Achieved So Far? To gauge future potential, a look back at UNI’s journey is essential. Launched in September 2020, UNI quickly gained traction, driven by the DeFi boom. Its price has seen significant highs and lows, reflecting the inherent volatility of the crypto market. Initially distributed via an airdrop to early users, UNI’s value surged as DeFi gained mainstream recognition. It reached an all-time high of over $40 during the 2021 bull run, demonstrating the market’s confidence in decentralized exchange protocols. However, like many cryptocurrencies, it experienced a substantial correction in subsequent bear markets. Understanding these past cycles is vital for forming realistic crypto predictions . The resilience of Uniswap, even during downturns, highlights its fundamental utility and strong community support. Its consistent development and upgrades have kept it relevant, even as new competitors emerge. Factors Influencing Uniswap Price Prediction: A Multifaceted Analysis Several factors will play a pivotal role in shaping the Uniswap price prediction for 2025 and beyond. These influences range from broad market sentiment to specific protocol developments. 1. Overall Cryptocurrency Market Trends: Bitcoin’s Influence: As the market leader, Bitcoin’s price movements often dictate the direction of altcoins, including UNI. A strong bull market for Bitcoin typically pulls altcoins higher. Macroeconomic Factors: Global economic conditions, interest rates, inflation, and regulatory changes can significantly impact investor sentiment towards risk assets like cryptocurrencies. 2. Growth and Adoption of DeFi: Uniswap is intrinsically linked to the health and growth of the broader DeFi ecosystem. Increased adoption of decentralized applications, more users entering DeFi, and higher total value locked (TVL) in protocols will directly benefit Uniswap. The expansion of layer-2 solutions and scaling technologies for Ethereum could also boost DeFi activity, making Uniswap more accessible and cost-effective. 3. Uniswap Protocol Developments and Upgrades: Continuous innovation, such as the introduction of Uniswap V4, could significantly enhance its capabilities, attract more liquidity, and increase trading volume. Improvements in user experience, lower transaction fees (via L2 integration), and new features will solidify its market position. 4. Competition from Other DEXs and Centralized Exchanges: The DEX landscape is competitive, with platforms like PancakeSwap, SushiSwap, and Curve Finance vying for market share. Uniswap must maintain its edge through innovation and efficiency. The ongoing debate between CEXs and DEXs will also play a role. As regulatory scrutiny increases on CEXs, DEXs like Uniswap might see increased adoption. 5. Regulatory Environment: Clarity or uncertainty in crypto regulations worldwide, especially concerning DeFi and governance tokens, can impact investor confidence and the operational scope of platforms like Uniswap. Uniswap Price Prediction 2025: What to Expect? Looking ahead to 2025, the landscape for DeFi tokens like UNI is expected to be shaped by several converging trends. Assuming a continuation of the broader crypto market recovery and increasing institutional interest in DeFi, Uniswap could see substantial growth. Key Drivers for 2025: Post-Halving Bull Run: Historically, Bitcoin halvings have preceded significant bull markets, which tend to lift the entire crypto market, including UNI. Ethereum Scaling Solutions: Further adoption and efficiency improvements of Ethereum’s Layer 2 networks will make Uniswap cheaper and faster to use, attracting more users and liquidity. Uniswap V4 Implementation: If Uniswap V4 is successfully rolled out and brings significant enhancements (e.g., hooks, singleton architecture), it could provide a strong catalyst for price appreciation. Based on various expert analyses and technical indicators, the Uniswap price prediction for 2025 often ranges widely. A conservative estimate might place UNI between $15 and $25 , while more optimistic scenarios, driven by strong market momentum and successful protocol upgrades, could see it challenging its previous all-time highs, potentially reaching $30 to $45 . This makes UNI a potentially attractive UNI investment for those with a mid-term horizon. Uniswap Price Prediction 2026: Sustained Growth or Consolidation? Moving into 2026, the crypto market might experience a period of consolidation after a potential 2025 bull run. However, Uniswap’s fundamental utility and continued development could help it maintain strength. Considerations for 2026: Market Maturation: The overall crypto market might show signs of greater maturity, with less extreme volatility and more stable growth. DeFi Dominance: Uniswap’s continued dominance in the DEX sector will be crucial. Its ability to fend off competitors and innovate will determine its trajectory. Regulatory Clarity: By 2026, there might be clearer regulatory frameworks for DeFi, which could either provide stability or impose restrictions. For 2026, the Uniswap price prediction could see UNI trading in a range of $20 to $35 , depending on market conditions. If the broader market remains strong, and Uniswap continues to innovate, it could push towards the upper end of this range or even exceed it. Conversely, a bear market could see it retract. This period will be critical for assessing the long-term viability of DeFi tokens . Uniswap Price Prediction 2027-2030: Long-Term Vision for the Uniswap Future Predicting prices several years out is inherently challenging due to the rapidly evolving nature of the crypto space. However, we can analyze the long-term potential of Uniswap based on its foundational strengths and the future of decentralized finance. Long-Term Drivers: Mainstream DeFi Adoption: As DeFi becomes more integrated into traditional finance and everyday use, Uniswap, as a leading DEX, stands to benefit immensely. Technological Advancements: Continuous improvements in blockchain technology, scalability, and cross-chain interoperability will enhance Uniswap’s reach and efficiency. Governance and Community: The strength of the UNI governance model and its active community will be vital for its adaptability and sustained relevance. For 2027, a reasonable Uniswap price prediction could see UNI in the range of $30 to $50 , potentially surpassing its previous all-time high if market conditions are favorable and significant upgrades are delivered. As we look towards 2028, 2029, and 2030, the potential for UNI could be substantial. Some optimistic crypto predictions suggest UNI could reach $70 to $100+ by 2030, assuming widespread DeFi adoption, successful scaling solutions, and Uniswap maintaining its leadership position. This long-term outlook paints a compelling picture for the Uniswap future , positioning it as a potentially lucrative UNI investment . However, it’s also important to consider potential headwinds such as increased regulatory pressure, significant competition, or unforeseen technological disruptions that could temper these ambitious targets. Is UNI a Good Investment? Weighing the Pros and Cons The question of whether UNI is a good investment depends on your risk tolerance, investment horizon, and belief in the future of decentralized finance. Let’s break down the potential benefits and challenges. Benefits of Investing in Uniswap (UNI): DeFi Leader: Uniswap is a dominant force in the DEX market, with significant brand recognition and user base. Strong Fundamentals: The protocol facilitates billions in trading volume and has a proven track record of innovation. Decentralization: As a truly decentralized protocol, it offers censorship resistance and transparency, appealing to a growing segment of users. Governance Rights: Holding UNI gives you a say in the future development and direction of one of the most important DeFi protocols. Ecosystem Growth: The broader Ethereum and DeFi ecosystem continues to grow, providing a strong tailwind for Uniswap. Challenges and Risks for Uniswap (UNI): Competition: The DEX space is highly competitive, with new protocols constantly emerging. Regulatory Uncertainty: Governments worldwide are still grappling with how to regulate DeFi, which could impact Uniswap’s operations. Smart Contract Risk: While audited, smart contracts always carry a degree of risk for exploits or bugs. Market Volatility: Cryptocurrencies are inherently volatile, and UNI’s price can fluctuate dramatically. Gas Fees: Although mitigated by Layer 2 solutions, high Ethereum gas fees can still be a barrier for smaller traders. Ultimately, a UNI investment should be part of a diversified portfolio and based on thorough research. The potential rewards are high, but so are the risks. How to Invest in Uniswap (UNI) If you decide that UNI aligns with your investment strategy, here’s how you can acquire it: Centralized Exchanges (CEXs): Platforms like Binance, Coinbase, Kraken, and KuCoin offer UNI trading against fiat currencies or other cryptocurrencies. Decentralized Exchanges (DEXs): You can swap other tokens for UNI directly on Uniswap itself or other DEXs like SushiSwap. Wallets: After purchasing, it’s recommended to store your UNI in a secure wallet, such as a hardware wallet (Ledger, Trezor) or a software wallet (MetaMask, Trust Wallet). Always ensure you are using reputable platforms and practice good security hygiene when dealing with cryptocurrencies. Expert Opinions and Analyst Insights on UNI’s Trajectory Many crypto analysts and financial institutions provide their own crypto predictions for Uniswap. While specific price targets vary, there’s a general consensus on Uniswap’s strong fundamental position within DeFi. Long-Term Potential: Most experts acknowledge Uniswap’s pioneering role and robust technology, suggesting significant long-term growth potential as DeFi matures. Innovation is Key: Analysts often highlight that Uniswap’s ability to continue innovating and adapting to market needs (e.g., through V4, L2 integrations) will be critical for its sustained success. Market Cycles: The cyclical nature of crypto markets is a common theme, with predictions often factoring in periods of rapid growth followed by consolidation. It’s important to remember that these are just predictions and not financial advice. Always conduct your own due diligence and consider multiple sources. Conclusion: Navigating the Future of Uniswap (UNI) The Uniswap price prediction for 2025, 2026, and extending to 2030 paints a picture of significant potential, albeit with the inherent volatility and risks of the cryptocurrency market. As a cornerstone of the decentralized finance ecosystem, Uniswap’s future is closely tied to the broader adoption and innovation within DeFi. Its strong fundamentals, continuous development, and robust community position it well for long-term growth. While short-term fluctuations are inevitable, the long-term outlook for a UNI investment appears promising, particularly for investors who believe in the power of decentralization and automated market makers. By carefully considering market trends, protocol developments, and your personal risk tolerance, you can make an informed decision about Uniswap’s place in your portfolio. The journey of DeFi tokens like UNI will undoubtedly be exciting to watch. By June 16, it surged to $14.48, surpassing a $1B market cap, but it dropped 45% to $11.33 on June 18 due to the DAO hack. By December 5, after a hard fork, the price fell further to $6.83. Ethereum recovered to $46.35 by March 16, 2017, and soared to $401.49 by June 12, during the ICO boom. It dipped to $157.36 by July 16 but rebounded to $253 by September 15. Ethereum surpassed $1,000 in January 2018 but dropped to $91.01 by December. Prices remained volatile between 2020’s high of $735 and low of $130. Ethereum started at $737, peaked at $4,293 in May 2021, and ended the year at $3,679, reflecting a year of significant growth. Ethereum ended April at $1786. At the start of May, the ETH price is trading between $1804 and $1867 Ethereum ended May at $2,521. In June, ETH is trading between $2,483 and $2,521. As of the beginning of July, Ethereum price is currently trading at $2,441. In July 31, ETH closed at approximately $3,807 – $3,808, marking a ~2.9% decline from the prior day. After falling to about $3,493 on August 1 (~ –5.7%), ETH dipped further to around $3,483 on August 2(~ –2.7%), then rebounded to approximately $3,469 on August 3 (+2.3%). Ethereum began August trading in the mid‑$3,400 range and climbed to approximately $3,900 by mid‑month. In the latter half of August, it surged to over $4,700, peaking near $4,830 before easing into the $4,600–$4,700. By September 1, ETH had retreated modestly to around $4,315–$4,390, showing consolidation following the earlier rally

title: Bitcoin Price Explodes: Amazing Surge Past $117,000!
body: BitcoinWorld Bitcoin Price Explodes: Amazing Surge Past $117,000! The cryptocurrency world is buzzing! According to recent market monitoring, the Bitcoin price has just made a significant move, soaring past the $117,000 mark. This exciting development sees BTC currently trading at $117,016.36 on the Binance USDT market, a clear indicator of strong bullish sentiment sweeping across the digital asset landscape. What’s Fueling This Remarkable Bitcoin Price Rally? When the Bitcoin price makes such a dramatic leap, it’s natural to wonder about the underlying causes. Several factors could be contributing to this impressive rally, ranging from macroeconomic shifts to increasing institutional interest. Here are a few potential drivers: Increased Institutional Adoption: More large corporations and financial institutions are entering the crypto space, bringing significant capital. Positive Market Sentiment: General optimism among investors, often fueled by positive news or anticipation of future developments. Halving Event Anticipation: While not immediate, the long-term impact of Bitcoin’s supply-reducing halving events often creates upward price pressure. Global Economic Factors: Sometimes, investors turn to Bitcoin as a hedge against inflation or economic uncertainty in traditional markets. Understanding these dynamics is crucial for anyone following the crypto market, as they paint a broader picture of Bitcoin’s evolving role in global finance. Why Does $117,000 Matter for the Bitcoin Price? Reaching $117,000 isn’t just another number; it often signifies breaking through psychological resistance levels that can pave the way for further gains. For many traders and analysts, these milestones are important indicators of market strength and momentum. A sustained move above such a level can: Reinforce Bullish Confidence: It signals to investors that the upward trend is robust and potentially sustainable. Attract New Capital: Higher prices and positive news often draw in new retail and institutional investors. Validate Bitcoin’s Store of Value Narrative: Consistent price appreciation strengthens the argument for Bitcoin as a reliable long-term asset. Therefore, monitoring how the Bitcoin price performs around these key levels offers valuable insights into market sentiment and potential future movements. Navigating the Market: What Should Investors Consider? While an amazing surge in the Bitcoin price is exciting, it’s also a reminder of the inherent volatility in the cryptocurrency market. For both seasoned and new investors, a cautious and informed approach remains paramount. Consider these actionable insights: Do Your Own Research (DYOR): Always understand the risks involved before making any investment decisions. Diversify Your Portfolio: Don’t put all your eggs in one basket. Spreading investments can mitigate risk. Stay Informed: Keep up-to-date with market news, regulatory changes, and technological advancements. Risk Management: Only invest what you can afford to lose, and consider setting stop-loss orders. The cryptocurrency market moves quickly, so staying ahead with knowledge is your best defense. The Road Ahead: What’s Next for the Bitcoin Price? The recent surge above $117,000 undoubtedly injects fresh optimism into the market. While predicting exact future movements is challenging, this milestone suggests a strong underlying demand for Bitcoin. Many analysts will now be watching for signs of consolidation above this level or further upward momentum towards new all-time highs. The journey of the Bitcoin price continues to be one of the most compelling stories in modern finance. This latest achievement underscores its resilience and growing acceptance as a major global asset. Whether you’re an investor, enthusiast, or simply curious, Bitcoin’s remarkable performance continues to shape the future of money. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) About Bitcoin’s Price Surge Q1: What is the current Bitcoin price? A1: As of recent monitoring, the Bitcoin price has risen above $117,000, trading at approximately $117,016.36 on the Binance USDT market. Q2: What factors typically influence the Bitcoin price? A2: The Bitcoin price is influenced by various factors, including institutional adoption, market sentiment, macroeconomic conditions, regulatory news, and supply-side events like the halving. Q3: Is $117,000 a significant milestone for Bitcoin? A3: Yes, breaking through $117,000 is often considered a significant psychological and technical milestone, indicating strong bullish momentum and potentially opening the door for further price appreciation. Q4: Is it a good time to invest in Bitcoin after such a price surge? A4: While a price surge can be exciting, investment decisions should always be based on thorough personal research, risk assessment, and financial goals. The crypto market is volatile, and prices can fluctuate rapidly. Q5: Where can I monitor the live Bitcoin price? A5: You can monitor the live Bitcoin price on various cryptocurrency exchanges like Binance, Coinbase, or reputable crypto market data websites. If you found this article insightful, consider sharing it with your friends and followers on social media! Help spread the word about the latest developments in the cryptocurrency market and keep everyone informed about the exciting movements of Bitcoin. title: Fed Cut Sparks XRP Momentum — REX-Osprey Launches First-Ever U.S. Spot XRP & DOGE ETFs
body: XRP Builds Bullish Pressure After Fed Cut — Can Bulls Break $3.13? XRP is showing signs of mounting bullish pressure as it consolidates in a tight range between $2.90 and $3.13, according to market analyst DavidTheBuilder. The cryptocurrency’s price action comes in the wake of the Federal Reserve’s decision to cut interest rates by 25 basis points, the first reduction since December, a move that could provide short-term support for risk assets. The analyst believes that XRP’s inverse head-and-shoulders pattern is signaling bullish reversal with a breakout above $3.13 being the stepping stone toward unleashing stronger upward momentum. DavidTheBuilder added, “From my perspective, an XRP daily close above $3.13 would be a strong signal. I’m watching that level closely. If it clears, I see $3.30–$3.40 as the next logical targets, with $3.80 still in play long-term. But if bulls lose $2.90, I’d expect a quick retest of $2.75 support before any further upside.” At the time of this writing, XRP was trading at $3.12, according to CoinGecko data . The Fed’s 25bps rate cut signals a more accommodative stance, typically fueling risk-on assets like cryptocurrencies. For XRP, this may attract increased trader inflows seeking higher returns amid lower traditional yields amid a German analyst predicting that a new all-time high (ATH) of $3.90 might happen soon. REX-Osprey Debuts First U.S.-Listed ETFs Offering Direct Exposure to Dogecoin and XRP In a landmark move for the cryptocurrency investment landscape, REX-Osprey™, the strategic partnership between REX Shares and Osprey Funds, has officially launched the first U.S.-listed exchange-traded funds (ETFs) providing spot exposure to Dogecoin (DOGE) and Ripple’s XRP. The REX-Osprey DOGE ETF under the tag DOJE and REX-Osprey XRP ETF labelled as XRPR mark a significant milestone, offering investors a regulated and accessible way to participate directly in the performance of these high-profile digital assets. Notably, XRPR offers direct exposure to spot XRP, a top digital asset powering fast, low-cost cross-border payments. The fund primarily holds spot XRP, with the remainder in XRP-backed ETFs, giving investors streamlined ETF access to a crypto asset with real-world payment utility. On the other hand, DOJE is the first-ever Dogecoin ETF, providing direct spot exposure to one of the world’s largest cryptocurrencies, famed for its Shiba Inu mascot and vibrant global community. By offering DOGE within a regulated 1940 Act fund, REX-Osprey opens seamless access to digital assets through traditional brokerage accounts, pioneering first-to-market spot cryptocurrency exposure for investors. Unlike traditional ETFs tied to futures, these spot-based funds hold DOGE and XRP directly, letting investors track real-time prices. They provide U.S. investors with a transparent, regulated way to access cryptocurrencies without managing wallets or exchanges. This launch taps into growing investor interest in secure, liquid crypto exposure. Dogecoin has evolved from a meme token into a widely adopted digital currency for payments and tipping, while XRP remains a key player in cross-border payments, offering investors a digital asset with real-world financial utility. Therefore, the roll out of REX-Osprey’s DOGE (DOJE) and XRP (XRPR) ETFs marks the U.S. debut of regulated, spot-based crypto ETFs, providing investors a new, accessible way to diversify portfolios and participate in the fast-growing digital asset market. Conclusion The launch of REX-Osprey DOGE and XRP ETFs marks a milestone for U.S. investors, blending regulatory oversight with direct cryptocurrency exposure. These spot-based ETFs offer a simple, secure, and liquid way to access leading digital assets, enabling broader participation, portfolio diversification, and engagement with top cryptocurrencies. Meanwhile, XRP is at a critical juncture, as technical signals and the Fed’s rate cut set the stage for bullish momentum. A clear break above $3.13 could trigger further gains, positioning XRP as a must-watch asset for traders and investors navigating the evolving crypto market.

title: Nvidia to Invest $5B in Intel and Develop Data Centers, PCs
body: Nvidia (NVDA), the world's largest public company by market cap, said it will invest $5 billion in Intel (INTC) and work with the chipmaker on developing custom data-center and PC products as artificial intelligence becomes more pervasive. The Santa Clara, California-based maker of the graphic processing units (GPUs) that underpin AI computing will buy shares of its neighbor at $23.28 each, 6.5% lower than Wednesday's closing price of $24.90, according to an announcement on Thursday . While Nvidia is known for its GPU production, Intel was a leader in developing microprocessors and entered public consciousness as the provider of central processing units (CPUs) that drove IBM-compatible microcomputers. Its fortunes have declined as AI, with its intensive computing requirements, has taken root. Intel stock surged 24% on Thursday, taking its market cap to $143 billion. That's just a fraction of the $500 billion it boasted in 2000, according to companiesmarketcap.com. Nvidia, with a value of $4.23 trillion, rose 1.85%. The U.S. government bought a 10% stake in Intel last month for $8.9 billion in an attempt to shore up the future of American chip manufacturing. The crypto industry watches Nvidia's performance with a keen eye as a proxy for market sentiment, which may reflect in AI tokens and the broader crypto market.

title: Bhutan Bitcoin Sales: Urgent Insight into a $100 Million Crypto Shift
body: BitcoinWorld Bhutan Bitcoin Sales: Urgent Insight into a $100 Million Crypto Shift The world of cryptocurrency is always buzzing with activity, and recent developments from the Kingdom of Bhutan have certainly captured attention. The Bhutanese government is actively engaged in significant Bhutan Bitcoin sales , a move that signals a strategic shift in its digital asset management. This is a story that impacts not just Bhutan, but potentially the broader crypto market. What’s Behind the Recent Bhutan Bitcoin Sales? Just recently, an address linked to the government of Bhutan made headlines by transferring a substantial amount of Bitcoin. Specifically, 570 BTC, valued at approximately $66.85 million, was moved to a new address. This transaction, reported by Lookonchain, occurred only a few hours after an earlier transfer of 343.1 BTC, worth about $40.18 million. Significant Transfers: Two major transactions totaling over $100 million in Bitcoin. Continuous Activity: These moves are part of a continuous pattern of the Bhutanese government selling its BTC holdings. Transparency: On-chain data provides clear evidence of these substantial transfers. These recent Bhutan Bitcoin sales highlight a consistent strategy. It’s not a one-off event, but rather an ongoing process that merits closer examination. Understanding Bhutan’s Unique Crypto Journey Bhutan, a small Himalayan nation known for its Gross National Happiness index, has quietly been involved in the cryptocurrency space for some time. Reports have suggested its involvement in Bitcoin mining, leveraging its abundant hydropower. So, why would a nation that potentially mines Bitcoin also be selling it? There are several plausible reasons for the ongoing Bhutan Bitcoin sales : Diversification: Governments often diversify their reserves to manage risk and allocate assets across various classes. Funding National Projects: Proceeds from Bitcoin sales could be channeled into infrastructure development, social programs, or other national initiatives. Treasury Management: As part of a sophisticated treasury strategy, nations might sell assets to realize profits or rebalance their portfolios based on market conditions and economic objectives. Bhutan’s approach offers a fascinating case study in sovereign wealth management within the digital asset realm. Their engagement demonstrates a pragmatic view of Bitcoin as a treasury asset. Potential Impacts of These Bhutan Bitcoin Sales When a sovereign entity like Bhutan makes significant moves in the crypto market, it can send ripples. While the total amount sold, over $100 million, is a fraction of Bitcoin’s overall market capitalization, the source of the sale carries weight. Consider the potential impacts: Market Sentiment: Such sales could be interpreted by some as a bearish signal, suggesting that even early adopters are taking profits. Liquidity: While not massive enough to crash the market, consistent sales add to the available supply, which can influence short-term price dynamics. Government Precedent: Other nations observing Bhutan’s strategy might consider similar moves, further legitimizing Bitcoin as a treasury asset, whether for holding or selling. The continuous Bhutan Bitcoin sales invite discussion about how governments perceive and utilize cryptocurrencies in their broader financial strategies. What Do These Bhutan Bitcoin Sales Mean for You? For individual investors and crypto enthusiasts, Bhutan’s actions offer valuable insights. It underscores the evolving landscape of digital asset adoption and management at a national level. It also reminds us of the dynamic nature of the crypto market, where even unexpected players can make significant moves. Here are some actionable takeaways: Stay Informed: Keep an eye on institutional and governmental crypto activities, as they often provide indicators of broader market trends. Diversify Wisely: Just as governments diversify, individuals should consider a balanced portfolio that aligns with their risk tolerance. Understand Market Drivers: Large transfers, regardless of source, contribute to market liquidity and can influence price action. The strategic Bhutan Bitcoin sales are more than just transactions; they are a window into the growing intersection of national finance and decentralized digital currencies. Conclusion: The recent and ongoing Bhutan Bitcoin sales represent a compelling narrative in the world of government crypto adoption. Bhutan’s calculated moves, offloading over $100 million in BTC, suggest a mature approach to managing digital assets within its national treasury. This isn’t just about selling; it’s about strategic financial planning in a rapidly evolving global economy. As more nations explore and engage with cryptocurrencies, Bhutan’s journey provides valuable lessons on the opportunities and challenges of integrating Bitcoin into sovereign financial frameworks. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: Why is the Bhutan government selling Bitcoin? A1: The Bhutanese government is likely selling Bitcoin as part of a strategic treasury management plan. This could involve diversifying national assets, funding domestic projects, or realizing profits based on market conditions. Q2: How much Bitcoin has Bhutan sold recently? A2: In recent transfers reported by Lookonchain, the Bhutanese government moved 570 BTC (worth $66.85 million) and an earlier 343.1 BTC (worth $40.18 million), totaling over $100 million in Bitcoin. Q3: Does Bhutan’s Bitcoin selling affect the overall crypto market? A3: While Bhutan’s sales are significant for a single entity, the amounts are relatively small compared to Bitcoin’s total market capitalization. However, consistent sales from a sovereign entity can influence market sentiment and add to overall market liquidity. Q4: What is Bhutan’s broader strategy with cryptocurrencies? A4: Bhutan has been reportedly involved in Bitcoin mining, leveraging its hydropower. Their strategy appears to involve both accumulation (through mining) and strategic selling, treating Bitcoin as a treasury asset to be managed alongside other national reserves. Q5: Where can I find more information about government crypto holdings? A5: Information on government crypto holdings often comes from on-chain analytics firms like Lookonchain, public disclosures, or investigative reports, though transparency varies greatly between nations. If you found this insight into Bhutan’s strategic Bitcoin sales valuable, please share this article with your network on social media! Your shares help us continue to bring you the latest and most impactful news from the cryptocurrency world. To learn more about the latest Bitcoin market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping Bitcoin’s institutional adoption. title: Space and Time Integrates USDC Payments for ZK Coprocessing to Expand Access to Verifiable Onchain Compute
body: San Francisco, California, September 18th, 2025, Chainwire Space and Time Foundation today announced support for USDC, the fully-reserved stablecoin issued through regulated affiliates of Circle Internet Group, Inc., on the Space and Time network. The integration enables smart contract developers to pay for zero-knowledge (ZK) coprocessing workloads using USDC, unlocking new possibilities for building onchain applications. Backed by Microsoft’s M12 and Circle Ventures, Space and Time is the purpose-built blockchain for ZK-proven data, powered by Proof of SQL , the first sub-second ZK coprocessor . The system is optimized to prove SQL database queries over millions of rows of data, enabling smart contracts to transact using real-time, ZK-proven data from onchain and offchain sources. Developers can use Space and Time to build expressive onchain applications that integrate verifiable data from multiple sources, and feed ZK-proven results directly into smart contracts. This unlocks new possibilities for data-driven DeFi, onchain gaming, sophisticated smart contracts and more. With USDC now integrated as a payment method, developers can easily leverage Space and Time’s ZK coprocessor using a widely adopted digital currency that is designed to maintain a stable value. USDC payments on the network are automatically converted into SXT, the network’s native token, for use within the protocol. “Enabling USDC payments on Space and Time is a huge milestone for the SXT ecosystem,” said Scott Dykstra, Co-Founder of Space and Time. “We’re focused on empowering developers to build secure, expressive applications onchain with the industry’s first sub-second ZK coprocessor, and the integration of USDC unlocks a smoother, more efficient way to power smart contracts and onchain apps at scale.” “We’re excited to see USDC live on Space and Time, a platform advancing the frontier of zero-knowledge infrastructure,” said Brian Schultz, Vice President, Corporate Development and Circle Ventures at Circle . “At Circle Ventures, we’re focused on supporting teams that are building foundational technologies that make digital assets more usable, programmable and trusted across the Web3 ecosystem.” The USDC integration follows Space and Time’s recent mainnet launch and reflects the company’s ongoing efforts to simplify developer workflows while scaling access to high-performance, verifiable compute. - END - About Space and Time Space and Time is the blockchain for ZK-proven data, which enables smart contracts to trustlessly access and compute over data from any chain or source. Powered by Proof of SQL, a sub-second ZK coprocessor, Space and Time empowers developers to build more intelligent, data-rich applications with verifiable data. For more information, visit : Website | X | Discord | Telegram | LinkedIn | YouTube About USDC USDC is an internet-native, fully-reserved, regulated digital dollar that leverages blockchain networks to enable businesses, developers, and individuals to conduct near-real-time, low-cost global transactions. It is a leading, fully-reserved global stablecoin issued through Circle’s regulated affiliates. To learn more about using or accessing USDC, visit USDC.com . To learn more about Circle’s regulatory authorizations, visit Circle’s Licenses page . Contact Catherine Daly marketing@spaceandtime.io

title: Circle Unveils Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol V2 on Stellar, Expanding USDC Interoperability
body: Circle announced that its Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol (CCTP) V2 is coming to the Stellar network, improving interoperability for USDC, the world’s leading regulated stablecoin. The upgrade will allow users to seamlessly transfer USDC between Stellar and more than 15 other blockchains, including Ethereum, Solana, and Base, unlocking deeper liquidity and wider use cases for the Stellar ecosystem. Seamless Cross-Chain Liquidity Historically, users faced challenges when moving USDC across different blockchains, often relying on custodial bridges or Circle accounts. Liquidity was fragmented, making it difficult to dynamically manage assets between ecosystems. With CCTP V2, Stellar becomes natively interoperable with every other CCTP-enabled blockchain. This integration allows USDC liquidity to flow freely, providing exchanges, wallets, and DeFi protocols with more efficient access. For decentralized exchanges (DEXs), this means better rates for traders, while centralized exchanges (CEXs) can consolidate liquidity rather than maintaining isolated pools. Programmable Transfers for Developers CCTP V2 isn’t just about liquidity—it also introduces programmability. Developers can embed cross-chain USDC transfers directly into their decentralized applications (dApps), enabling seamless integration with the Stellar network. Projects can even include metadata within transfers that can trigger autonomous actions on the destination chain via Hooks, opening up new possibilities for automation and innovation. By building on top of CCTP V2, developers can leverage Stellar’s strengths—fast, low-cost payments and robust offramping options—without having to design complex multi-chain liquidity strategies. This creates a unified development experience across chains and accelerates the adoption of cross-chain finance. Eliminating Bridge Risk with Native Transfers A key innovation of CCTP V2 is its 1:1 burning and minting process. Instead of relying on wrapped tokens or custodial intermediaries, USDC is burned on the source chain and minted natively on the destination chain. This model eliminates bridge risk, improves transaction security, and ensures settlement can occur in seconds. For users and businesses, this means simpler, safer, and faster movement of capital across chains. The efficiency of this model also boosts confidence for institutions that require predictable liquidity and compliance-grade infrastructure. Strengthening Stellar’s Global Payments Role The Stellar network already powers global payments with low fees, near-instant settlement, and a network of 475,000+ MoneyGram locations for fiat on- and off-ramps. With CCTP V2, Stellar extends its role in cross-border finance by linking directly to the broader multichain USDC ecosystem. This upgrade makes Stellar a hub for stablecoin liquidity while enabling new financial applications, from treasury management to cross-chain lending. As programmable money gains traction, CCTP V2 ensures Stellar remains at the forefront of innovation, bridging traditional payments with the multichain future. The post Circle Unveils Cross-Chain Transfer Protocol V2 on Stellar, Expanding USDC Interoperability appeared first on Cryptonews .

title: Igniting Momentum: U.S. Stock Market Opens Higher with Optimism
body: BitcoinWorld Igniting Momentum: U.S. Stock Market Opens Higher with Optimism The financial world buzzed with activity as the U.S. stock market kicked off the trading day with a noticeable surge. Major indices reported strong openings, signaling a wave of optimism among investors. This initial climb reflects a broader sentiment that could influence various investment avenues, including the digital asset space. What’s Driving the Positive Start for the U.S. Stock Market ? Today’s robust opening saw all three primary U.S. stock indices climb, marking a positive beginning to the trading session. Specifically: S&P 500: Rose by +0.44% Nasdaq: Saw a significant increase of +0.87% Dow: Posted a modest gain of +0.05% These figures suggest a broad-based positive momentum. Investors are likely reacting to a combination of factors, including recent economic data, corporate earnings reports, and evolving geopolitical landscapes. When the U.S. stock market shows strength, it often indicates a ‘risk-on’ environment, where investors are more willing to seek higher returns. This early rally can be attributed to several key drivers. For instance, better-than-expected corporate earnings from bellwether companies often instill confidence. Furthermore, positive economic indicators, such as improvements in employment figures or manufacturing data, can reassure investors about the underlying health of the economy. Consequently, this translates into increased buying activity across various sectors. Investor Sentiment: A Critical Catalyst Investor sentiment plays a pivotal role in daily market movements. When there’s a collective feeling of optimism, it can create a self-fulfilling prophecy, pushing prices higher. Today’s opening certainly reflects such a positive mood. The tech-heavy Nasdaq’s strong performance, in particular, highlights renewed interest in growth stocks, which often thrive in periods of market confidence. Understanding these dynamics is crucial for any investor, whether in traditional equities or emerging markets like cryptocurrency. A thriving U.S. stock market often correlates with a stronger global economy, potentially freeing up capital for diversified investments. However, it’s always important to remember that market movements can be volatile, and an opening rally does not guarantee an entire day of gains. Navigating the Market: What Comes Next? While the initial hours of trading are promising, market participants will be closely watching for sustained momentum. Key economic announcements, shifts in commodity prices, or unexpected geopolitical events can quickly alter the trajectory. Therefore, staying informed is paramount for making sound investment decisions. For those observing the cryptocurrency space, a strong traditional market can sometimes signal increased liquidity and risk appetite, potentially benefiting digital assets. Conversely, if traditional markets face headwinds, investors might become more cautious, affecting all asset classes. The interconnectedness of global financial markets means that movements in the U.S. stock market are rarely isolated events. In conclusion, today’s higher opening for the U.S. stock market provides a compelling start to the trading day. It underscores the dynamic nature of financial markets and the multitude of factors that influence investor behavior. While the immediate outlook appears positive, continuous monitoring and strategic planning remain essential for all market participants. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What does it mean when the U.S. stock market opens higher? A1: When the U.S. stock market opens higher, it means that the major stock indices (like the S&P 500, Nasdaq, and Dow) have started the trading day with an increase in their values compared to the previous day’s closing prices. This often indicates positive investor sentiment and anticipation of favorable economic news or corporate performance. Q2: How do these market openings impact individual investors? A2: A higher market opening can boost the value of an individual’s stock portfolio. It can also signal a ‘risk-on’ environment, encouraging investors to consider new opportunities. However, it’s crucial to remember that opening movements don’t dictate the entire day’s performance, and market volatility can occur. Q3: Is a strong U.S. stock market opening good for cryptocurrency? A3: While not a direct correlation, a strong traditional market, like the U.S. stock market, can sometimes indicate a broader ‘risk-on’ sentiment in the financial world. This can lead investors to allocate capital to higher-risk assets, including cryptocurrencies, as they seek greater returns. Q4: What factors typically cause the U.S. stock market to open higher? A4: Several factors can contribute to a higher opening, including positive corporate earnings reports, optimistic economic data (e.g., strong job growth, low inflation), favorable geopolitical developments, and general investor confidence. Anticipation of positive news can also drive pre-market buying. Q5: How long do these initial gains usually last? A5: The duration of initial gains can vary significantly. Sometimes, the momentum carries through the entire trading day. Other times, new information, profit-taking, or shifts in sentiment can lead to a reversal. It’s why market watchers pay close attention to news and data throughout the day. Did you find this analysis helpful? Share your thoughts and insights on social media! Let’s continue the conversation about the latest market trends and how they impact your investments. Your network might find this valuable too! To learn more about the latest financial market trends, explore our article on key developments shaping global economies and investment strategies . This post Igniting Momentum: U.S. Stock Market Opens Higher with Optimism first appeared on BitcoinWorld .

title: Analyst Sets $5 Target For The Dogecoin Price If This Happens
body: Crypto analyst CryptoELITES has predicted that the Dogecoin price could reach $5, providing a bullish outlook for the foremost meme coin. The analyst also mentioned what needs to happen for DOGE to reach this ambitious price target. Dogecoin Price Eyes Rally To $5 If This Happens In an X post, CryptoELITES stated that the target for the Dogecoin price is $5 after a DOGE ETF launches. The analyst opined that a huge wave of institutional money is about to flow into meme coins very soon, with this money coming through the ETFs. Notably, REX-Osprey is launching the first Dogecoin ETF today. Related Reading: Dogecoin Price Eyes 1,250% Surge To $3.5 – Here’s The Roadmap The REX-Osprey Dogecoin ETF will provide institutional investors with spot exposure to DOGE and could serve as a catalyst for a Dogecoin price rally to $5, as CryptoELITES predicts. New capital could flow into the DOGE ecosystem through this ETF, which would spark higher prices for the foremost meme coin. Furthermore, it is worth mentioning that more Dogecoin ETFs could launch soon enough, especially with the SEC’s approval of generic listing standards, which help fast-track crypto ETF listings. Bloomberg analyst Eric Balchunas revealed that DOGE is one of the crypto assets that has futures on Coinbase, which makes it eligible for faster listing under the SEC’s new rule. Notably, Grayscale, Bitwise, and 21Shares have filed for a DOGE ETF, and their respective funds could launch soon, which is bullish for the Dogecoin price. The launch of these other ETFs besides the REX-Osprey ETF means that more liquidity could flow into the meme coin’s ecosystem, although it remains to be seen if the $5 target is achieved. Meanwhile, CryptoELITES had also previously predicted that the Dogecoin price could reach $5 from a technical analysis perspective. The analyst cited DOGE’s historical cycles and the gains it recorded previously as the reason why the meme coin could reach this target. $10 DOGE Target Still In Place Crypto analyst DOGECAPITAL has again reiterated his $10 target for the Dogecoin price in this cycle. He believes that the meme coin can reach and surpass this target based on historical trends. He noted that each cycle’s first year (2013, 2017, and 2021) has historically delivered the strongest gains. Related Reading: Dogecoin Price Just Broke A Regional High For The First Time This Year, Why A 300% Rally To $1 Is Possible The analyst noted that in the current cycle, the pattern suggests that the Dogecoin price could be in for substantial upside this year if history repeats, although the yearly candle hasn’t closed yet. His accompanying chart showed that DOGE could even reach as high as $36 in this cycle. Meanwhile, DOGECAPITAL predicted that Dogecoin’s cycle could extend from the projected October cycle top if Bitcoin’s does. At the time of writing, the Dogecoin price is trading at around $0.28, up over 6% in the last 24 hours, according to data from CoinMarketCap. Featured image from iStock, chart from Tradingview.com

title: BTCC Posts Strong Reserve Backing in September Report, Maintains 143% Collateralization Across Major Assets
body: BTCC, the world’s longest-operating cryptocurrency exchange, has released its September Proof of Reserves (PoR) report, revealing a total reserve ratio of 143% as of September 15. The report affirms that all major digital assets on the platform remain overcollateralized, reinforcing BTCC’s ongoing emphasis on transparency and user fund protection. The report includes updated figures for leading cryptocurrencies, showing that Bitcoin is backed at 111%, Ethereum at 152%, XRP at 166%, and stablecoins such as Tether (USDT) and USD Coin (USDC) at 156% and 121% respectively. Cardano (ADA) also showed a reserve ratio of 153%. Alex Hung, Head of Operations at BTCC, commented on the figures, stating: “Since Q3 began, the crypto market has remained consistently active, and BTCC continues to maintain a platform-wide reserve ratio above 140%. Maintaining high reserves is essential to withstand volatility and maintain solid trust during uncertain times. The latest September PoR report reflects our commitment to long-term user protection and asset transparency.” This marks the fifth consecutive monthly PoR update from BTCC since it began publishing reserve data earlier this year. Prior reports also reflected strong coverage, with reserve ratios standing at 141% in August, 132% in July, 135% in June, and 152% in May. Alongside the PoR update, BTCC shared new operational metrics. The platform now serves over 10 million registered users globally, offering more than 350 spot trading pairs and over 380 futures contracts. Between September 1 and 15, BTCC processed $41 billion in spot volume and $315 billion in futures trading volume. BTCC is also set to appear at TOKEN2049 Singapore, one of Asia’s leading crypto industry conferences. During the event, the exchange will showcase its ongoing collaboration with NBA All-Star and Defensive Player of the Year Jaren Jackson Jr. (JJJ), part of an initiative to connect digital finance with broader cultural touchpoints such as sports and entertainment. Following the main conference, BTCC will host a poolside networking event on October 3, bringing together partners, community members, and industry professionals. The gathering is supported by Tencent Cloud, AWS, Megazone, PANews, and TechFlow, and will feature music, informal discussions, and opportunities to connect in a more relaxed setting. title: Bitcoin price today: up to $117k on Fed rate cut, SEC listing overhaul; BNB at ATH
Tron's 6x Premium To Its Underlying Crypto Token Value Seems Unjustified
body: Summary Tron Inc. transitioned from a toy company to a crypto treasury firm, now holding and staking TRX tokens as its core business. Tron Inc. trades at a 500% premium to its underlying TRX token value, making it an expensive vehicle for crypto exposure. Risks include extreme volatility of the TRX token and the unsustainable nature of staking yields, which resemble dilution rather than true earnings. Initiate with a hold rating, as both the premium and inherent crypto risks make Tron Inc. shares unattractive for investment. Tron Inc. ( TRON ) is a company that changed its name, shareholders, and business recently. It went from a toy designer and wholesaler (under the name SRM Entertainment) to a crypto treasury company, specializing in the crypto token TRX. The founders of the TRON crypto protocol are related parties to Tron Inc. Tron Inc.'s business is to stake the TRON token (TRX-USD) and earn a yield for that staking. I do not want to make many comments on whether the price of the TRX is fair or not, or on the sustainability of the yield mechanism. I will make some comments on risks around staking crypto. However, the most important comment for the article is the realization that, after accounting for dilution in recent transactions, at current prices, the shares of Tron Inc. are traded at 6 times their TRX treasury value at market. Therefore, even for those who believe in the TRX value and its staking potential, Tron Inc. is not a reasonable ownership vehicle. For that reason, I initiate with a Hold rating on the company. A toy manufacturer bought with crypto tokens Up until July 2025 , Tron Inc. was called SRM Entertainment and traded under the ticker SRM. SRM was an ailing toy designer and wholesaler, specializing in toys for theme parks (like themed backpacks or drinking cups). The company generated operational losses and had not grown sales at all in a long time. Then, in June 2025, the company received an equity injection of $100 million in exchange for 100 thousand preferred class B shares, convertible into 200 million shares, plus 220 million warrants exercisable at $0.5 per share (all explained in the 10-Q under note 6 ). The equity injection was made not in cash but in digital assets, specifically 365 million tokens of the TRX. Then, in August 2025, the investor (Bravemorning Limited, as disclosed in a recent release ), exercised the 220 million $0.5 strike warrants with an additional injection of $110 million, also paid via TRX, 312 million in this case ( release ). As a result, Bravemorning became the largest shareholder of the company. On a fully converted basis, it owns 420 million shares out of 440 million fully diluted shares (200 million from the conversion of preferreds, plus 220 million from the exercise of warrants, plus 20 million pre-existing shares). Tron Inc. now owns about 677 million TRX, which, according to specialized sources , is about 0.7% of the total supply of TRX (95 billion). Affiliated parties to the TRON token Bravemorning is owned by Weike Sun (disclosed in a recent 8-K ). Mr. Sun is also a director of Tron Inc. As disclosed in the 2Q25 10-Q, also under Note 6, Weike Sun is the father of Justin Sun, who founded the TRON protocol, foundation, and token. The other two directors are affiliated with the TRON protocol or related companies (disclosed in the same place). New business: staking and Treasury The company's new business is to own TRX and to stake them. The staking of crypto tokens is a complex process through which some blockchains validate transactions and make decisions. In exchange for the staking, the owners of the token receive a yield on that token itself. It is akin, in some way, to earning a deposit yield on a currency. In Tron Inc.'s case, the process is more complex because the company does not directly stake the TRX it owns, but rather hires an affiliate company, which stakes the TRX, but instead of paying the TRX yield to Tron Inc., issues staked TRX (sTRX), which, according to the 10-Q, are convertible into TRX, albeit, as shown in price charts , at a slowly decreasing parity. The Treasury business is not actually a business (it generates no earnings), but it is actually a market function. If people want to have exposure to the TRX, they can buy Tron Inc. instead of going through the process of owning TRX directly, which might present higher complexity in regulatory, custodial, or other fronts. Crypto risk exposures This is not an article about the TRX or crypto. However, given that Tron Inc. basically owns TRX, an explanation of the risks is important. First, like with any financial asset, we have price risk. Crypto tokens are extremely volatile, and therefore, they can fall in price. Buying shares in Tron Inc. directly exposes the shareholder to that risk. Determining the value of a crypto token is hard, one might say even impossible. One is indeed betting on sentiment in an extremely volatile market. Second, the methodology of earning a yield on the same cryptocurrency or crypto token has led many cryptos astray, with the best-known example being the Terra and LUNA collapse . Paying a yield on its own cryptocurrency is like offering a share dividend on a public stock paid via stock issuance. It is basically a yield paid via dilution/issuance, which decreases the scarcity and value of the rest of the ownership. Other considerations Cash should not be a problem Given that TRON has issued equity, it has a significant cash runway, currently in the form of TRX, valued at approximately $236 million, as we will see below. Of course, the value of these holdings depends on a volatile crypto market, and they could go down. The cash burn is harder to determine, given that the company has only presented 2Q25 financials so far, and the change in business, control, and name started only in June 2025, that is, at the end of the quarter. We do not have much insight into the economics of the Treasury operation. Liquidity is good so far Again, we are talking of a company that has substantially changed in the past few months, so historical figures are not representative of the current situation. Still, the company has presented an average daily volume of 4 million shares since early July, potentially lower if removing the outlier in mid-July. At about $3 per share, that would represent a liquidity of about $12 million per day, which can be considered sufficient for a small-cap of this size. Data by YCharts Owning TRX via Tron Inc. is expensive Some potential shareholders in Tron Inc. might face regulatory or other burdens that lead them to prefer paying a premium for owning the TRX via Tron Inc. instead of owning the TRX directly. I would not own the TRX directly because of the reasons exposed above, but even more, I would not own it via Tron Inc. because I would be paying a 500% premium on the price of the TRX. As of today, the TRX is worth $0.35 per token. Based on the disclosures linked above, Tron Inc. has a total ownership of 677 million TRX, or about $236 million, at current prices. The company has 440 million shares on a diluted basis, meaning about 1.5 TRX per share, considering that liabilities are minimal, and also other assets of the company. That is to say, the company's stock underlying TRX ownership is worth about $0.5 at market prices. However, the company's stock trades at more than $3, or a 500% premium on the underlying value of the tokens. Summing up, Tron Inc. is a stock that trades at a substantial premium to its token ownership. These underlying tokens, in addition, are potentially overvalued and risky, therefore compounding the loss potential. In my opinion, there is no reason to own Tron Inc. shares, and their price risk, either via TRX price reduction or via premium reduction, is significant. I initiate with a Hold rating for those reasons. Upside risks are substantial Even though I have a relatively negative view about the price or value of TRON, readers should be warned about the potential for the stock to rise significantly, either because the price of TRX climbs or because of hard-to-explain sentiment factors. Crypto treasury companies have generally traded at a premium to underlying NAV, although I do not think it has reached the level of 500%. The best example is MicroStrategy, now called simply Strategy Inc. ( MSTR ). These stocks are used as a vehicle for speculative activity and can climb rapidly above what could be considered reasonable fundamentals (which are already hard to determine in the crypto world).

title: Unlocking Remarkable Bitcoin Yield Products: KODA and Lombard Finance Forge a Powerful Partnership for South Korean Institutions
body: BitcoinWorld Unlocking Remarkable Bitcoin Yield Products: KODA and Lombard Finance Forge a Powerful Partnership for South Korean Institutions The world of digital assets is constantly evolving, and for institutional investors, finding secure and compliant opportunities is paramount. A significant development is unfolding in South Korea, where two major players are joining forces to expand the reach of Bitcoin yield products . This collaboration promises to open new avenues for growth and stability in the institutional crypto space. Why Are Bitcoin Yield Products Crucial for South Korea? South Korea’s digital asset landscape is experiencing rapid growth, coupled with an increasingly sophisticated regulatory environment. Institutional clients are actively seeking ways to participate in the crypto market while mitigating risks and ensuring compliance. This demand for secure and regulated financial instruments, particularly those offering returns on digital assets, has made Bitcoin yield products a focal point. Korea Digital Asset (KODA), a leading digital asset custodian, and Lombard Finance (BARD), a prominent Bitcoin DeFi firm, have recognized this need. Their strategic partnership is designed to address the evolving regulatory landscape and the growing appetite from institutions for sophisticated on-chain financial services. Pioneering Institutional Access to Bitcoin Yield Products This collaboration between KODA and Lombard Finance is set to revolutionize how South Korean institutions engage with Bitcoin. The partnership aims to provide unparalleled access to institutional-grade Bitcoin yield products , ensuring both security and regulatory adherence. This is a critical step towards mainstream adoption of digital assets within traditional finance. Key initiatives stemming from this partnership include: Enhanced Access: Offering institutional clients direct and secure access to advanced Bitcoin yield products . Market Development: Jointly fostering the growth of the digital asset market for financial institutions and corporations in South Korea. Risk Management & Education: Establishing a comprehensive, phased framework for education and risk management, tailored to institutional needs. Lombard Finance brings substantial expertise to the table, reporting over $1.5 billion in assets under management (AUM). Its flagship asset, LBTC, has been seamlessly integrated with major global DeFi protocols, showcasing its robust infrastructure and market presence. The firm holds an impressive 57% market share in the Bitcoin Liquid Staking Token (LST) sector, solidifying its position as a dominant player. Ensuring Security and Compliance in Digital Asset Offerings Security and regulatory compliance are non-negotiable for institutional investors. KODA, backed by KB Kookmin Bank and its esteemed partners, is renowned for providing secure, regulation-compliant custody services. This foundation of trust and reliability is crucial for attracting and retaining institutional clients who prioritize the safety of their digital assets. The partnership’s focus on a phased education and risk management framework underscores a commitment to responsible market development. By equipping institutions with the necessary knowledge and tools, KODA and Lombard Finance are not only offering innovative Bitcoin yield products but also building a sustainable ecosystem for digital asset investment. What Are the Benefits of This Collaboration for South Korean Institutions? For South Korean financial institutions and corporations, this partnership offers several compelling benefits: Trusted Access: Gaining access to innovative Bitcoin yield products through trusted and regulated entities. Market Leadership: Benefiting from the combined expertise of a leading custodian and a top DeFi firm. Reduced Risk: Operating within a framework that prioritizes security, compliance, and comprehensive risk management. Future-Proofing: Positioning themselves at the forefront of digital asset innovation in a rapidly evolving financial landscape. This strategic alliance marks a significant milestone in the institutional adoption of digital assets in South Korea. It highlights a proactive approach to meeting market demand while upholding the highest standards of security and regulatory integrity. In conclusion, the partnership between KODA and Lombard Finance represents a powerful synergy aimed at delivering advanced Bitcoin yield products to South Korean institutions. By combining KODA’s secure custody and regulatory compliance with Lombard Finance’s DeFi innovation and market leadership, this collaboration is poised to unlock new opportunities and foster greater confidence in the digital asset space. It’s an exciting time for institutional investors looking to strategically engage with Bitcoin. Frequently Asked Questions (FAQs) Q1: What is the primary goal of the KODA and Lombard Finance partnership? A1: The primary goal is to expand the availability of secure and compliant Bitcoin yield products and on-chain financial services for institutional clients in South Korea. Q2: What kind of services will this partnership offer? A2: The partnership will provide access to institutional-grade Bitcoin yield products , develop the market for financial institutions, and establish an education and risk management framework. Q3: What is Lombard Finance’s role and expertise? A3: Lombard Finance is a Bitcoin DeFi firm with over $1.5 billion in AUM and a 57% market share in the Bitcoin Liquid Staking Token (LST) sector. It brings expertise in innovative DeFi solutions. Q4: How does KODA ensure security and compliance? A4: KODA, backed by KB Kookmin Bank, provides secure, regulation-compliant custody services, ensuring the safety and regulatory adherence of digital assets for its institutional clients. Q5: Why is this partnership important for South Korean institutions? A5: It offers South Korean institutions a trusted, secure, and compliant pathway to engage with Bitcoin yield products , helping them navigate the evolving digital asset market with confidence and access new investment opportunities.
